My clumsy girlfriend drops this a lot, this things lived through icy hiking trips so its pretty tough, no problems with it so far in two years, battery life is still great lasts through a whole day of hiking and picture taking. Pictures are what you expect from cameras at this price, if your really technical about specs and every other nitpicky thing, you should just save your money for a Good SLR.

Reviews.Title: Great little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: J. C.
Reviews.Content: Just right when I want quality photos without taking my Canon Rebel SLR to an event or outing.Fits nicely in pocket and is very easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Now have 2 of these
Reviews.Author: M. Schermerhorn "Laughter is the best medicine"
Reviews.Content: I take this camera everywhere and use it several times a week.  Most pictures are of sunset etc but I have also been happy with the videos that it takes.  Price was right also.  I like compact cameras and this is the best one thus far.  Camera is meant for casual and basic use.  Battery last a fair amount of time also before having to charge again.  For special events, I make sure to bring the charger and it is also efficient with charge time.  Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: RustyCas
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a true "pocket camera" to carry in the 'leg pocket' of my work pants.  Takes great photos and has held up well.  Usually available at a significant discount as I write this (3/18/13).

Reviews.Title: Canon Elf 300HS
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I received the camera a few days ago. I've shooting pictures, movies and printing pictures. The sharpness of the pictures is excellent. The auto function for focus is a bit slow but adequate. The camera is small but with the sandpaper like finish it is easy to get a good gripe on it with my large hands. Not sure how long battery life will be. I'll probably list that when I get to that point. The menu items are fairly easy to manipulate and t he telephoto works well. All in all I purchased this compact camera to take on trips. The quality and clarity of the pictures with the 12.1 megapixels is excellent. I like the camera and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Canon cameras fan.
Reviews.Author: Rolando
Reviews.Content: I love this camera a lot.Size is perfect to keep in my pocket.Pictures are amazing in quality and the colors are perfect.I have been a Canon camera fan for many years.I;m complety satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Michael Shimek
Reviews.Content: This is my backup camera for my Canon D7. I love that I can take it anywhere and have it on me at all times, with minimal intrusion. I especially love it's performance in low light conditions. As a food blogger, I need a camera that I can shoot in restaurants, without flash, and still have the full color from the food. Low light, candle light, barely any light: it does not matter. This little camera will capture the image. I have not been able to play any videos (from any Canon product) on my computer. Playback seems to only work on the camera itself. I have seen this problem from other Canon users as well. I would think Canon would address this issue. I do, however, LOVE this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good slow motion mode
Reviews.Author: MarcoTulio
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I need to do sports video analysis and I'm very happy with it. It is very good altough you need a very good light to get a decent video. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the slow motion video has a 2 minute limit. I assume this is a buffer that gets full before writing the information to the SD card. I guess more than 2 minutes would also be a very large file, but even with a 16 GB card you can record more than 40 minutes of video. Very cool!

Reviews.Title: excellent point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Raine Carraway
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photography expert, but this camera has been great for what I use it for. It is easy to use and set up, small enough to carry with you, and the image quality is great on still photos and good on video. It also has some fun custom shooting/editing features built in.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: margie siers
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for someone, they personally liked the camera. It is compact, yet seems to perform very well. I will promote this type of camera to my friends and family.I especially like the 16gb that holds 5000 pictures. That is phenomenal.The power pack is compact and doesn't take long to recharge the battery.

Reviews.Title: perfect size
Reviews.Author: vickun "vickun"
Reviews.Content: Battery life is so so...that is, if you are picture happy on a vacation, make sure you charge it everyday...otherwise, it's nice and handy to keep lying around...and then charge it up after every two weeks of light use, just to make sure...

Reviews.Title: takes great pics
Reviews.Author: hanna simon
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is great and there are so many cool settings on the camera. battery life is also pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great little budget camera
Reviews.Author: Stosik
Reviews.Content: Canon hasn't disappointed me yet. This is my second camera from them and it works great. Aside from the zoom when recording video, you can hear the lens moving, and sometimes the sound randomly cuts out on one channel, and the menus that could be more intuitive--but for the price I paid for this, I can't complain too much, the video quality is very good. On all counts, this is oodles better than the camera I had before this--I forget what brand it was, some 8 MP, but it was a piece of s*** that I got screwed on, even my 8 year old 5 MP Canon was better than it.  Stick with the brand you know that's true.As I write this, I've had it over a year, and the price is 40 dollars more than I paid for it and I paid $179.

Reviews.Title: Good camera that you can carry every where.
Reviews.Author: Mona Nasiri "Monasiri"
Reviews.Content: I like my camera . It's been a year I am having it and no complaints. It's for sure not one of those pro cameras that you take quality pictures with. It's just a small inexpensive camera that you can always have with you in your pocket :)

Reviews.Title: Honestly for size and performance excellent!
Reviews.Author: D. Lombardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a best buy and overpaid by $50 bucks for my girlfriend almost 2 years ago.  The camera still takes great photos and the rugged aluminum case has got some paint wear from lot of use.  I own a D700 not a cheap camera by any means and this little guy still gives a run for my money in some situations.  Bottom line, for god sakes, its a tiny point and shoot and that's where you need to focus your reviews on, don't compare it to big high end DSLR'S.  GREAT CAMERA BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dianne F. Stephenson
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It takes great pictures. Has just enough features but not so many that you can't use it. It's quick and has decent battery life too. Anyone looking for a high quality small camera can look no further.

Reviews.Title: Great little backpacking camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff "gramgeek"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a compact lightweight camera I could take backpacking, and the ELPH 300 seemed to fit the bill.  I wanted the wider angle lens for landscape shots and haven't been disappointed with it's performance.  So far I've been very satisfied with the quality of the pictures and battery life is excellent.  But Canon made some changes in the menu system that are annoying, so I give it 4 stars.  You now need to access a menu and scroll to find ISO settings, and the select that option, then make the change.  This used to take 1 step, now it takes 3.  I change ISO frequently to meet changing conditions, so this is a negative.The zoom works well, but once you get past the optical zoom, the images aren't very crisp.  This isn't a huge negative for me, I stick to the optical zoom.The camera works well in low light (a plus).  All in all, I'd recommend it and am happy with my purchase.Added September 16:  I've taken this camera on several trips now and it's a champ.  I took photos by moonlight and was amazed by the quality.  It fits easily into the pouch on my waistband, battery life is excellent and the wide angle is perfect for landscapes.

Reviews.Title: Very User Friendly and Worked Great Out of the Box!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Oceaneco1 "Julie"
Reviews.Content: I unboxed the camera and charged the battery (about 1 1/2 Hours) put the battery in the camera and powered it up. It takes beautiful clear photos and really nice video. I initially purchased the ELPH 510hs and I did not like the touch screen. I found myself fumbling around on the camera because I would accidentally touch the screen and change things I didn't want to change.I am not saying it was not a good camera, it just was not as user friendly for me personally as compared to the 300hs.I did purchase a 3yr warranty that includes Mechanical and Electrical and Drop and Spill coverage as well.This camera seems to have some really mixed reviews.I purchased this camera because the camera I had before (Kodak) worked one day and was dead the next.I only had it for 2yrs. I wanted a camera that was a little more than what the Kodak had to offer and I feel I made a good choice.I also have a larger Olympus camera, but I wanted a little point and shoot camera for trips on the motorcycle and for taking pics of items to sell.I would have never thought that a camera this little would be capable of taking such great photos and video!!I purchased the red elph and it is a great color with a nice satin finish. The 510hs had a high shine and showed fingerprints.If you are trying to make a decision between the 300hs and the 310hs, from what I can tell, between reviews and videos on youtube and other internet sources, the 300hs has a wider view angle and the 310hs has a longer view angle. So, if you like to take pictures at a distance, you may want to purchase the 310hs. Although, the 300hs has a 5x optical zoom and that is plenty of zoom for my needs. I also wanted to mention that these cameras are Mac friendly and that also was a factor in this purchase for me.

Reviews.Title: Great small digital camera, amazing video
Reviews.Author: fays
Reviews.Content: great for snap and shoot. Settings are pretty nice. Beware of the "low light" setting, while it takes the best pictures with regards to colors, the picture quality is definitely reduced. Amazing video, this camera is literally our video camera. Worth it for the video alone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera when you don't want to lug the big "guns" around.
Reviews.Author: Engineeringnerd
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed using this camera while touring Alaska on vacation instead of lugging my DSLR's around.  I was able to get shots that would have been quite difficult.  I'm really delighted with the camera for casual use and with the quality of the pictures and video.  Here's a look at a few frames showing different situations:[...]

Reviews.Title: Best point-and-shoot I've seen yet!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a great camera! The first outing with this camera was at the Little Rock Zoo, and my wife and I were shocked at how crisp all the photos were. We've had umpteen different compact digital cameras, and none of them took very nice zoomed photos. (I have shaky hands, so that may be part of it.) With this camera, though, we took some zoomed shots and WOW. It's the first camera I've seen that actually does what they advertise. Seriously, I'm impressed with this camera. It's definitely small, and for some people, that may be an issue, but the finish has a sort of texture to it that keeps it from being overly slick (and it has a strap too). It's definitely my best camera yet and when I logged in here to write this review Amazon prompted me to check out the newer model of this camera, a 16 MP one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Ian Glen
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a 12 day backpacking trip. It's lightweight, small, and shoots great photos. Easy to use and durable. Even held up to the dust and dirt. Battery life is amazing, and I was able to get three days of shooting in on one battery.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ks12345
Reviews.Content: I have always enjoyed scrapbooking and taking pictures.  It was not until my purchase of the Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12 MP CMOS Digital Camera with Full 1080p HD Video that I found a camera that worked perfect for my own needs.  I am able to take my pictures and have such a clear and perfect picture.  It is really a nice thing to have all the different setting options available to you when life throws them at you all the time.  I like the fact you can just click on the screen that relates to your position so nicely instead of knowing which setting you should be in.  I am happy to say that I have had this camera for a great deal of time and it is still on the market selling strong.  The only issue I have had with the camera is that the digital screen is now starting to go out.  I now have a line across my screen.  Although it does not hurt the actual picture that comes out, it is just the screen itself. Over all, I love my camera and I do not plan on up grading anytime soon.

Reviews.Title: small, easy to use and great quality
Reviews.Author: SJ "mom of 2"
Reviews.Content: I really believe you get what you pay for. I have a top end canon dslr which I use for portraits and landscape photography. However, I wanted something I could slip into my purse or pocket, and this camera is it! It's easy to use, my kids love using it, it takes great pictures for the price and looks good too. It will never be the same quality as my dslr, but that is not why I bought it. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product, took Sri Lanka in stride
Reviews.Author: Sam Adams
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take with me on a trip to Sri Lanka where I would be living and traveling with local people.  I had some trepidation after reading about the canon lens lock up syndrome that affected this and some other models of camera, but my worries were for naught.  I took over 2000 photos in 30 days from the mountain areas of Nuwera Eliya to the arid regions around Polonnaruwa to the beaches at Trincomalee and Batticaloa.  It dealt with heat, humidity and dust with no problem. (I did take reasonable care to keep the lens area clean.)  I kept it in the hard case I purchased with it when not using it, but most of the time it was in my shirt or pants pocket and popped in and out when a photo op arose.  I took several videos with it as well.  I was glad i paired it with a class 10, SanDisk Extreme 32GB 45MB/s SDHC Flash Memory Card SDSDX-032G-X46 which was big and fast enough for the job.  There were some times it was slow on the second shot and i found the display a little small for my middle aged eyes to tell if i was in focus, but most of the shots i took (on auto) were in focus and quite adequate for what i wanted, which was to preserve the memories of my trip.  Well worth the money and while not as good as my Nikon SLR, I know I wouldn't have taken one tenth as many pictures as I did if it wasn't so compact and handy to have around.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants a camera they can and will use.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: This is a nice small camera.  I bought it for my teenage daughter's birtdday.  She really likes it. It is easy to use and fits great in a small purse or pocket

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Baskert
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this camera for our trip to Italy and we couldn't have been happier.  The pictures were crisp and clear, the battery life was great, and it fit nicely into her purse or my pocket.  If you're looking for a good, sturdy camera you've come to the right place!

Reviews.Title: Little camera, big pictures!
Reviews.Author: Edger Ralfson
Reviews.Content: This camera greatly exceeded my expectations. The picture quality is excellent for such a small device. Obviously, anyone considering buying this shouldn't expect SLR quality, but for the price, it's an excellent value. The only quip I have with it is that the auto/program mode switch isn't attached very well and is loose. It hasn't fallen out yet, but it rattles inside the hole it's placed it. It might just be a defect, but it's certainly not worth returning over as the camera still functions 100% normal.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Pacilinda
Reviews.Content: this camera is  perfect for me, easy to use and the price is reasonable, a steal! I will definately recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: For price, size and functionality its a great Camera
Reviews.Author: KJ
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were looking for a smaller point and shoot camera to replace our old one, saw this one in Best Buy and looked into it for a while.  It is small and compact, light and looks good.  It has a rough kind of outside cover which offers a better grip.  It has a ton of different functions and picture settings that it can do.  You have to go into the menu a little bit and it isn't as accessible to change like on other cameras, but not a problem at all.  It takes very clear pictures and they show well on the computer.  I didn't like that you have to have a battery included with it (I liked my old camera I would just charge at my computer) but this camera does come with a port to re-charge the battery.  I got the package which included the camera + a case + a 4g memory card + an extra battery all for $170.00, the camera itself was $129.00, down from $229.00 a short while ago.  I know its been out for a year, but this camera for the price offers a great deal of power, especially for its small sleek size.  Only problem I have noticed so far is that the flash is in a bad spot and its easy to cover up with your finger when taking a picture.  Will just need to adjust how I hold it so I don't see it as a big problem.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera and the HD video...
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: I really can't say enough about this camera - the quality is great, especially for the price. In addition, the HD video it takes is amazing. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: You've got to pay more if you wish to video indoors at low light
Reviews.Author: R. Oswald
Reviews.Content: A fine camera, but a bit disappointed when using it to film orchestra performances indoors at low light levels.  Other that that a good product, though if I could stand to take a larger camera along with the family on trips, I'd own a larger, better camera instead.  Size matters, and in this particular case, the smaller the better.

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Point & Shoot
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small pocketable camera for those times when carrying a full sized DSLR wasn't an option.  Beyond size, I also wanted good image quality, fast operation, long battery life, and a reasonable price tag.  The Elph 300 delivers all this in spades and throws in decent video capture to boot.The only caveat I'll mention is that you should keep an eye on the histogram for important shots as the Elph will occasionally blow highlights.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Photos/Videos
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, the quality of the photos is out of this world. The battery life is pretty good unless you are making videos, then it sucks up battery fast. But other than that I am in love, the camera's auto mode is really great and adjusts perfectly for every picture. There are also some great modes to play around with for coloring and what a not.

Reviews.Title: Bang For Your Buck!
Reviews.Author: Von_Dode
Reviews.Content: I picked up this camera specifically for it's high video quality, and it doesn't disappoint. It's also loaded with a ton of fun features, and captures great photos. For the money, this is probably the best camera on the market. I paid $175 or so, and now it's down to the $160's! There are other cameras at this price point, but not with the Canon name and Canon quality!

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Shan
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures and has so many fun features! I love that it is small enough to just stick in my pocket.  This little camera takes big pictures!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Zeldenrust
Reviews.Content: I did some research before I bought this camera and it has paid off. I love this camera. It is very easy to use, is compact and easy to carry and have had no battery issues whatsoever. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I haven't taken a bad picture yet!! Great camera
Reviews.Author: dadu
Reviews.Content: Image quality is top notch for such a compact camera.Fit perfectly in the palm of your hand.Very textured finish, but helpful for a good grip.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH 300 HS Powershot Camera
Reviews.Author: ellen wingfield
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera.Canon makes a great product at an affordable price.Takes wonderful pictures, downloads easily, software interfaces well with Windows Photo Gallery.Durable, small, automatic feature great, just point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 300
Reviews.Author: SanRip
Reviews.Content: Excellent little camera. I keep it in my shoulder bag, it is so easy to use, with excellent photos. Easy to carry about and quick to use.

Reviews.Title: Check compatibility
Reviews.Author: S. Patterson "Inspector 007"
Reviews.Content: We have had our camera for about 5 months.  I have been getting an error 32 message for at least 2 months.  The camera shuts down and needs to be restarted.  Also, the camera cannot be recognized on my iMac which is running OS 10.4.11 (Tiger).  I need to upgrade to at least 10.5 (which means I'll lose Photoshop 7).  The camera did work with iPhoto, but does not appear on the computer's desktop, just in iPhoto's window.  However, it recently quit working with iPhoto.  The photos seem good, but I have had so many problems with just getting the photos off the camera, it is hard to say.  Will update the review after I contact Canon about the error message.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera!
Reviews.Author: Abby Christopher
Reviews.Content: I'm having a lot of fun with this camera. The one I had before was so old I could only take a few pictures before I had to replace the 4 AA batteries. Coming from the dinosaur I had, all the features are really appreciated. I'm still learning them. Easy to use too. Even for someone like me who is not the best picture taker in the world.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I've been using the camera for a while now and have not had any issues. It is easy to use and takes good pictures. I do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Butch "Butch"
Reviews.Content: Camera is compact and light.  Very easy to learn to use and takes great pictures.  Great quality for the dollars spent.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for the money
Reviews.Author: snfcnb
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace my little point and shoot camera that I have had for years and years. I trust Canon the most for point and shoots and based on the reviews of this one decided to pick the Elph 300. I also use a Nikon D60 and wanted something that had excellent picture quality so I would not have to lug around my Nikon for quick shots. This camera is definitely it. It is so small! I'd say it is just a little bigger than a credit card. It is very light weight. The body has a sand paper like texture to it which makes it easier to grip. The view screen is very nice. I like the different ways you can customize your settings. It's pretty standard. It has tons of effects, if you like that sort of thing, like fisheye, toy cam, color swap, color accent, b&w;, etc. As well as, various modes of shooting in different conditions. To access the effects takes a second. It takes great pictures! Really really great pictures! I have been playing around with it since I got it and I am pleasantly surprised every time. So far, I have yet to find a condition where the camera didn't take a great photo. I highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Amazing point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Super Samoan
Reviews.Content: You won't be disappointed in this one! For a point and shoot camera, I found that the Canon PS Elph 300 lived up expectation and more. I just used it last week for my brother's girlfriend st. patty's day run in kansas city and the shots I got were phenomenal. Even the video I captured was awesome. I can't complain really. Setting the software up with my macbook was a breeze. Go ahead and pick one up. You wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size and Good Image Quality
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: I've bought this camera from our local store about a year ago for a long upcoming whole summer trip. I tried a few Sony point and shoots, and didn't like their pictures; specifically, their night and low light pictures. Interestingly, some of them--like the waterproof TX100--had CMOS sensors, but their quality was not in par with this Canon. For a point and shoot, this camera delivers high quality pictures in day light and very good pictures in dim lighting. It also gives you a good video with anti-shake and image stabilization in a small sized form factor.When I first touched the camera in the store, I didn't like the grainy finish. It was really dirty, and I thought it catches dust easily. However, I was surprised at how clean the brand new one looked when I got mine. After one year of use, it is still as clean as the day one. Its grainy metal finish has several advantages. For one, it doesn't get scratches too easily, and it doesn't slip from your hands. Just remember, the black version come in grainy finish, but the red and silver ones are smooth.If you are just buying this camera, remember that Canon has released a new version called 320HS with same 24-120mm focal length lens. It is 1.5 times more in price, but it has built in Wi-Fi, bigger LCD screen, higher resolution, and many predefined automatic shooting modes. You can find it here: Canon PowerShot ELPH 320 HS 16.1 MP Wi-Fi Enabled CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle Lens with 1080p Full HD Video and 3.2-Inch Touch Panel LCD (Black).I am very satisfied with my purchase and Canon point and shoot camera line in general. If I need another point and shoot camera, I will buy from Canon ELPH series again.

Reviews.Title: canon camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: This Canon PowerShot ELPH 300HS Digital Camera is great!  The lightweight camera does all the functions and more that my family needs.  Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: Narrow Queen
Reviews.Content: I think this camera is the best I have had thus far.  I have purchased several Canon cameras before this last one and have enjoyed using them.  The Cannon Power shot that I purchased recently is quite easy to use, slim type makes it convenient to carry and it does take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 300
Reviews.Author: AlwaysRight
Reviews.Content: This is a fabulous camera...it is the second Canon digital camera purchased over the past couple years.  The number of features will astound you and the price was terrific!

Reviews.Title: Small size... Great pics!
Reviews.Author: gayusarathy
Reviews.Content: The looks are little unconventional ... It has a matte finish compared to the glossy ones we're used to! The other thing that catches the attention is the small size of it. It is very thin and makes you think never ever drop this one! Some reviews mentions that on dropping, the lens gets stuck. But I've dropped this a couple of times already (once on a hard surface from about 5 ft) but the camera just works fine...Coming to picture quality... I took more videos than photos on this one and the video quality was great when viewed on a HDTV. It was obviously not good when zoomed or under low light. I liked the photo quality as well, especially when taken in low light. Once, we couldn't use the flash as it was misty and the flash was reflecting on the water droplets. So I just switched the flash off and the photos came out really well. My friend was using a slightly older model of a canon camera and the pics were pathetic.This is  worth the money spent and amazon sweetened it with a free 4 gb sd card and a hdmi connector!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: sbergeon
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic fun little (very small, very light) camera. All I need is something to carry around for random snaps of active dogs and forest trails, no professional picturizer. In fact, of the several hundred snaps I've taken so far, only a handfull have been retained, an average better than my previous camera and so for me an improvement. The HD movie feature is fantastic, it's so easy to use even I can do it. As just another idiot without expertise or special knowledge but with an opinion, here's mine: this camera is great.Also, the Case Logic TBC-302 FFP Compact Camera Case (Black) is a perfect carrier for this camera.Also also, don't forget to buy a memory card (i.e. Transcend 16 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card TS16GSDHC10E) - I didn't notice the camera came without until it arrived!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Canon power shot elph 300 he
Reviews.Content: Great pics- quick, clear shots that enlarge well!  Small, but easy to use.  Had to get used to the smaller size when using the auto flash- fingers can easily cover it!  Just takes getting used to.  Excellent camera, great value!!!!

Reviews.Title: good solid camera
Reviews.Author: Brian McBride
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional phtogtapher.  I just need a camera that can take good pictures, quickly and with little effort.  This one does.  The battery life had been good so far, too.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic! My old camera is a Kodak EasyShare C513 5MP Zoom Digital Camera - Silver (mine is pink). It was good for what it was, but I decided it was time to upgrade to something better. I went camera shopping 2 weeks ago. I was looking for something that was really small, but took great pictures and could zoom while recording videos with sound. This is it. I wandered into Radioshack and they were having a sale. After viewing this camera and the Nikon COOLPIX S4100 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x NIKKOR Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch Touch-Panel LCD (Plum), I bought the Nikon because it was $80 less.That was a mistake! The Nikon feels cheap out of the box and the touch screen is not responsive. It is supposed to be a 14MP camera, but I don't think the pictures looked that much better than the Kodak. I didn't check reviews online before because I was never going to be able to pick a camera without touching it first. I saw that the Nikon only got 3 stars on this site. The reviews are terrible. Once I saw that CNET did not even bother to review it, I drove back to Radioshack and exchanged the Nikon for the Canon.In the two weeks I have had it, I have taken photos and videos at a national park and a state park. Fantastic! The camera has a million settings, but so far I have only used the Auto setting. It adjusts for the light, has great facial recognition, and takes so fast. When shooting videos of birds, I can actually catch them before they fly away. When following a tour guide, I don't have to miss portions of their story because I am waiting for my camera to take a picture. If you need a great point and shoot, this is it. Buy it, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH 300 HS. Absolute stunner of a camera.
Reviews.Author: anon
Reviews.Content: I have no idea when it comes to cameras! All I wanted was one I could stick in my pocket and quickly snap away when needed. The 300 HS is exactly what I was looking for. It's small, compact and ridiculously easy to use. I previously had the lower model which was really really bad in low light conditions and so wanted a camera that handles low light well. Again, this camera is absolutely superb in low light. When out in a club it takes lovely photos and always comes out really sharp and warm. I recently went to San Francisco and took a load of landscape shots. They are simply stunning little photos. This camera takes shots that look like they were taken from a professional SLR camera but at less than half the price. The 1080i HD is also flawless. Looks jaw-droppingly sharp and smooth.An absolutely stunning little camera and a real bargain too. I definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a small compact camera.

Reviews.Title: upgrade from my previous powershot
Reviews.Author: Celeste C. Curtis "not the average norm"
Reviews.Content: for valentines day my wife suggested we get something for us both. GREAT! we got the canon elph 300 powershot. we have a powershot sd780 (i think that is the model name/number). i went with the NOT touchscreen style: i like the buttons. it does the hd video. it otherwise seems the same. it is great. i had to get fatter cards = 16gb now instead of 4.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Roulette "Rock Concert"
Reviews.Content: I recently purchase this camera to replace my Canon PowerShot SD600. I received the camera a week before leaving on a Caribbean Cruise vacation. On the trip I took over 800 photos in various lighting conditions and situations. Nearly all of the photos came out clear and focused. It is capable of taking clear images out a side window of a moving vehicle, in a dark cave and even when zoomed in 20x. I am very impressed with this camera so far! It has proven to be a fantastic replacement for my previous Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera. Does what it says it would do!
Reviews.Author: C. Acey "life-long student"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Canon PowerShot SD400, which my husband now uses as his pocket camera. I have been pleasantly pleased with the way this camera performs in low light, though I am still sort of overwhelmed with all the options. I usually just leave it on manual, daytime. I don't like how large the screen is but I think it's just because I am so used to the size and the feel of the old camera....speaking of which, I *do* prefer the straight lines and boxiness of the older camera to the curved "cuteness" of this new one.

Reviews.Title: Handy!
Reviews.Author: Johan
Reviews.Content: This camera is really handy, I had to choose between an DSLR and I chose this, it is really small and thin perfect to carry around. Great picture 'too

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for my father, he loved the camera. Great for the dad who wants to take a picture of everything quickly.

Reviews.Title: great point an shoot
Reviews.Author: I. Wainer
Reviews.Content: Camera is small, convenient and very cute. Pics are sharp, high def, very easy to use. Instructions are clear and I was up an running in no time!  I havent really looked into all the capabilities since just the AUTO function is more than enough for my needs. Overall very happy (its been 4 days).

Reviews.Title: Love it!  Can't go wrong with Canon!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Meyers
Reviews.Content: I've owned the PowerShot since the G1 days, and i've gotten 3 or 4 cameras, all Canon, so this was an easy choice for me.  The pictures are vibrant and this little camera packs a punch!  Has all the functionality i need and the pics turn out great!  I had compared the pictures I took with a friend who had a Nikon and mine turned out much better.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: This camera is super! I love the ELPH 300!
Reviews.Author: jp2code "Joe Pool to Code .NET"
Reviews.Content: I'd been looking at this one for a long time, and my old camera (Panasonic DMC-LC33 3.2MP) still works very good. It does not have so many bells and whistles as this one, though.During Black Friday, the price dropped to under $150 and I picked it up.I carry it often because it slips into my jeans pocket easily where as my old one did not. This one also connects quicker, powers on faster, takes better photos, and on and on.I have not found a case that I like yet because it is so small, but I am sure I will find one soon.** UPDATE 01 Feb 2013 ** I found a case that works GREAT for this phone, and it is made by Canon, too: It is the Canon 5601B001 Deluxe Soft Camera Case.Still think this is a great camera, too!

Reviews.Title: Am very pleased
Reviews.Author: E. Brown
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon A620 that seemed like it might be on its way to extinction.  I really liked the pictures it took, so I decided to get another Canon camera.  At first I thought I should get another camera that took AA batteries, but as I checked price/features/weight I decided to buy the HS300 from Amazon.  I think I did well price-wise because they were on sale and came with a 4GB SD card (one of the "10" series, which I think is faster than the "4" series), and cables.  Anyway, I took the new camera with me to Italy.  It performed very well and was very light weight.  Even with many hours of walking per day the weight and size were great - I never felt tired or had trouble shoving the camera into a pocket or purse.  Compared to the heavier weight A620 I did find there was more of a tendency for the camera to move as I pressed the shutter button, so more care was required to get clear pictures.  But the balance between price/features and weight was good for me.  I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Minh T. Banh "mb"
Reviews.Content: This is the third powershot camera I bougnt from Amazon. It is very light and easy to keep in pocket. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera ! easily carried and beautiful shots
Reviews.Author: Thor1964
Reviews.Content: showed my friend what i'd bought and he demanded one too.. we loved it and it's easy to use. the manual settings are better then the auto settings for low light but this is the best camera i've had in awhile and i prefer it to my super expensive Nikon DSL.. this little cam is one of the best purchases i've ever made and i'm planning on getting more for family members and friends.. it's great !! get one !! highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Always happy with canon..
Reviews.Author: Michelle Torres
Reviews.Content: So my last canon crapped out, lenses got stuck open. I'd dropped it harshly many at time. Can't blame Canon for that really. So actually tried getting a shock proof camera from a competitor. It was bulky & the pics just didn't compare. Quickly bought got myself this guy & am happy I did. Super-compact & the pic quality can't be beat for the price point :)

Reviews.Title: Ravishing rouge camera
Reviews.Author: Sparkles!
Reviews.Content: My last camera drowned to death and I never thought I would find another one I could be so happy with.  This, however, is a camera I have a romance with.  Compared to some other cameras in its price range, it is really a looker! It's smaller than my cell phone and the red is radiant.For a camera so small, it works quite well in low-light situations, which is the primary reason I chose it.  Whereas with other cameras set on low-light and without flash, photos are a complete blur, on this camera photos can still come out reasonably well with only a slight blur.The movies turn out nicely too, however, if you zoom while recording, you may hear the zoom extending or retracting.Really though, for this price?  No complaints!

Reviews.Title: perfect for the pocket size camera
Reviews.Author: Elinor Stalker "elinor"
Reviews.Content: My daughter in law want a small camera to put in her bag. She Has a larger DRL camera, but is not always carrying it with her for those unexpected opportunities . She uses the small one all the time. The pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Nice easy to use
Reviews.Author: Wags "Wags"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife since she always has problems taking in focus pictures with her old camera.  She loves this new one.  All of the pictures she took at Christmas came out great.  I'm sure she won't use many of the features that this camera has but as long as she is happy that's great.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: shifkay
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It takes great shots; they are clear and vivid. There are so many extra features that are fun and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Randy Shields
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. My wife has been looking for a quality camera that was small enough to go everywhere without a big bag. I gave her this for Christmas and it has so far delivered beyond expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: R. Martins
Reviews.Content: Have only had this camera for a couple of weeks but it has not let me down at all.I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive digital camera you can take with you anywhere you go. Enjoy it, I know I am.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: devoteetokids
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  Clear photos and it is easy to operate. Love the closed eye detection feature.Would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 300
Reviews.Author: henry h. robinson
Reviews.Content: The Canon elph 300 is the perfect point-and-shoot camera.Small, easily fits in shirt pocket or creates no uncomfortable bulge in a pants pocket.Quality is better than more expensive cameras.  Accepts old & new memory disks.Reviews state the 300 is a better camera than the replacement versions of the 300.

Reviews.Title: Great value proposition
Reviews.Author: T. Moseley "Business Man"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for me fiancée.  I did extensive research on the different options and I could not find a better camera for the money.  We are not professional photographers so we were looking to find a good camera under $200.  This camera has definitely fit the bill.  I know some have had problems with the lense and I will update if I experience the same.

Reviews.Title: Better than the newer model 310HS
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: After extensive searching for a low-priced point and shoot, I narrowed my search down to the Canon ELPH. I've had them in the past and they're great to use. You should go check out SnapSort (.com) and do a side-by-side comparison of this camera and the newer version, the 310HS. You should stick with this camera for the price, considering the newer model is actually lacking features. Go check out what the experts have to say. You won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: The size is right!!!
Reviews.Author: Gladius
Reviews.Content: Classy looking and feeling.  Great to put in pocket and forget about.  Video is superb and pictures surprisingly good.  5x zoom is enough.  24 at wide end is excellent.  Fast.  Battery better than expected.  Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my Father, he loves it, he is amazed by the quality of shots for the little camera. He has a DSLR that takes amazing shots but he would rather use this since the pictures are almost as good for your everyday shows and its so compact / light!

Reviews.Title: Slick little camera
Reviews.Author: Stickman
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera. Small, capable, controls are not too complicated. Being able to shoot video has turned out to be a really fun addition to the still image capture for which we bought it.

Reviews.Title: Only Canon for me!
Reviews.Author: Heidi Lohman
Reviews.Content: I love Canon digital cameras. They are the only digital camera I will buy! They are easy to use, the pictures are always crisp, and they last forever!! I've had Nikon and Fuji cameras that are newer than my Canon Elph that I bought several years ago, and the old Canon outlasted them both. I finally got a new one and I am not disappointed! It is a great little camera for travel too. If you plan on taking a lot of pictures on vacation, get an extra battery and charge both of them.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Rick Veszelyes
Reviews.Content: After some Gypsies stole my belated camera in Hungary, I was looking everywhere for a replacement. I'm glad I found this one. I use it often and have been nothing but impressed. It's a handy little point and shoot and I've taken some great shots with it. I just hope it stays on my person when I go to Hungary this summer!

Reviews.Title: Great fast shipping! CHEAP!
Reviews.Author: equach415
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my girl friend.  She loves the color red. She loves the camera...can't stop pressing that button. Camera was a deal and amazon prime offered fast 1 day shipping due to holidays. THANK YOU AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Gave as gift
Reviews.Author: Amy S.
Reviews.Content: Bought for first camera for my daughter. She seems happy with it and she says it's easy to use. Time will tell. It is definitely better than my SD1000 camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: R. DUMAR "full metal guy"
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable capabilities in such a small package. Favorite feature: Plug in to HD TV & watch videos immediately (Order A - C Hdmi cord).  But, wish I had waited a week - went to Costco & saw the Elph 310 which has an 8x Zoom (Fifty buck more - but worth it to me).

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Elph 300
Reviews.Author: tigerlily1019
Reviews.Content: Great little camera!  I shopped around and read many review before purchasing the Elph, and I'm very satisfied with it.  I love the sleek body, the pictures turn out really good, and I like the fact that it has buttons and not a touch screen.  If that's what you're looking for, I would highly recommend it.  It's user-friendly for the most part, although I like to get the user's guide out so I knew what/where everything is.  Also, get the silver color because the black finish is easily scratched and looks horrible.  Not sure about the red.  Overall great camera, very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Happy New year! I hope everyone had a joyous Christmas!
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: I received this easy camera for Christmas and so far I am enjoying it. The size is perfect to carry with me all of the time.  I got the red one because, why not? It's pretty.  The pictures are sharp, the zoom is most convenient and videos are crisp and clear.  It is a wonderful pocket camera and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Bellagirl
Reviews.Content: After reading the wonderful reviews for this product, I decided it was a good choice and purchased it.  It is truly a great camera for the money.  Very sharp pictures and video.  Bought it for our 17-year daughter, who can be a little rough on things from time to time, and she especially loved the textured finish on the camera, saying it was much easier to hold.  Doesn't have a slick finish that makes the camera slip out of your hand easily.  Nice pocket size, too.  Highly recommend this product!  Initially when we ordered it, it was out of stock and not expected for delivery until a few days after Christmas.  But, I have had such good experiences with Amazon, I chose not to cancel the order.  It did come in early and we received it 2 weeks before Christmas.  Always love purchasing from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous little camera
Reviews.Author: SD
Reviews.Content: Had the camera 3 weeks and have already had quite a few opportunities to use it. Haven't had time, which is necessary, to master the menu, but have already taken many great stills and video all in automatic. Color, focus,sound and depth are great. Love the fact that video zooms in and out even in auto play, and that the camera has multiple face recognition. Sure I will enjoy this little camera, and it is little, even more when I master the menu.

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 300HS
Reviews.Author: T242
Reviews.Content: This is simply an outstanding product. I've had earlier versions of this series which have been great. The video quality from this camera is fantastic. For a simple point & shoot it is wonderful. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Guston
Reviews.Content: Yes, this is what I was looking for.  Small, powerful and yet perfect pictures and videos.  I've used bulkier cameras and I appreciate the portability of this little miracle. Thanks Canon....1 month later ...I say that if I were to buy this again, I would not get the black one.  This sandy-surface is kind of "a strange feeling" in your hands.It's a perfect camera, but in silver or red color!2 months later ... I say that it's a perfect little camera.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: MagnoliaMS "MagnoliaMS"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a Christmas gift for a family member.  She is very excited about it's small size and capabilities.  If it lives up to its good reviews, she will be really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Jesus
Reviews.Content: this is a very great camera for the price.the 1080p is amazing for a small sized camera . like all the effects on the camera. the focus isnt really great while recording but when taking pictures its great ! and also i dont think you can record and have flash on at the same time? that kinda sucks.:/ Overall i give it a 4.8  :)And just a tip. buy a Bigger SD Card that can hold up to 16 0r 32 gb because 1080p uses a lot of memory . 2gb card can only hold 7 mins of video

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: SL
Reviews.Content: I bought it as an xmas gift. She loved it. Easy to use and lots of bells and whistles for the price. Would definitely recommend this camera to others who just want to point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Good All Purpose Camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon SX20is and it has been a very good camera for macro pictures of wildflowers, family and birds.  Of course, it has been very slow for birds--no pictures of small, fast-moving birds.  The main problem with it has been the bulk and size.I bought this little Canon Powershot Elf 300 HS to have a camera that I could always have with me. It has been a delight to use and enjoy.  I can always have it in my jeans pocket.  I put it in a little pouch to give it extra protection inside my pocket.  During Christmas week, my wife and I went to dinner with a couple who are friends.  I took a picture of the couple at the table and then the waiter took a picture of all four of us.  The camera is so simple, automatic and easy to use, it required no instructions to the waiter about how to use the camera.  My picture and his picture were both excellent.  The Christmas lights shinning through the glass behind the table was beautiful background.  The little flash did a great job of giving even lighting to each person.  The skin tones and colors were beautiful.The macro shots of wildflowers are excellent with very appealing colors.  And macros are extremely easy to take.I have been using the little camera to take digiscope pictures of birds.  I take the pictures through a Nikon Fieldscope 82MM.  I zoom the little camera to nearly full zoom and place the camera lens in line with the eyepiece of the scope.  It is easy and takes great pictures.  The image is a little soft compared to an expensive DSLR with long telephoto lens.  But, the softness gives the picture a romantic look.I took digiscope pictures this week of Great Blue Herons and Snowy white Egrets.  Both of these birds are photogenic--the pictures captured their beauty and elegance.I try to remember to put my little camera in my pocket each time I leave the house.  I never know when I might see a picture of something worth remembering.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Fitt  "SCC man"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a few weeks before Christmas and that was a good thing. The manual is very abbreviated and I had to look up information on the Internet to learn how to use some of the unusual functions.  The videos and pictures have been fantastic.  Prior to purchase, I read extensive reviews that cautioned about the damage that could occur to the lens area.  I have been careful with the handling and have had no problems.  I would recommend this camera for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Sheehan "The Mad Shopper"
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera to purchase, small easy to use & got it in red so it would be easy to find in my purse!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Deb1111
Reviews.Content: Compact size that goes in pocket or purse.  Quick to come on, takes mulpile shot in a few seconds, great auto feature.  Ideal camera for trips.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: shoeme
Reviews.Content: Good video, and takes sharp pictures.  Easy to download to pc without installing any software.  Win7 loads the driver, and ready to download your price winners.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: FlyinG "Working Too Much"
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it except the battery life is not as long as my Elph 1000.  But I think the smaller size, wide angle, and more zoom make this a huge improvement from my old one.  I think it's also easier to use, even though there are a ton of new features.  All features seemed to be more accessible for quick switching of settings while I was using it.  As for battery life, it's not bad. I used the camera for two days and took a couple hundred pictures with it before the battery died.  It seems that videos drain the battery the quickest.  If it weren't for using so much for video I probably could have gotten a hundred more pictures.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good!
Reviews.Author: peace.love.paws
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon XSI that I never used and decided to down size.  After many reviews and comparisons I decided to purchase this point and shoot.  I do not regret this purchase whatsoever.  I love the gritty texture of the body of the camera and the marco setting.  The screen is a decent size, could be a bit bigger but it lets you zoom in on the photos so that is nice.  It does not come with a memory card or adapter so make sure to purchase one otherwise you cannot save your photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: T47 Productions
Reviews.Content: Overall, the camera is great and it does great job as a video camera well.  It is highly rated at various sites and i am glad i researched and found this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my brother on his 20th BD. Great photo quality and simple to use. You can't go wrong with 149 dollars CANON Camera!

Reviews.Title: Nice features in an easy to take with you package
Reviews.Author: ALB "Motorpenguin"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to take along, as it is small and lightweight.  The black finish is non-slip and looks nice.  The video quality is very nice and you can zoom in and out while taking video (optical at least...I keep digital zoom turned off).  Has quick to access scenes and has a dedicated video record button.  Also starts up fairly quick to begin taking photos.  My dad liked it too and bought one for himself.  One con is that I couldn't just cable it up and begin viewing...software had to be installed.  But a card drive is easy too and gets around that.

Reviews.Title: Slick camera
Reviews.Author: T. Vo "TVo"
Reviews.Content: I returned a more expensive feature rich Canon SX230 HS for this more simple compact camera. Picture quality is great. Ready to shoot pictures or video in a second. Not too much settings or setup. Perfect for someone like me who just want to point and shoot. Highly recommend it, and at $150, it's a bargain!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: Working mom of 2!
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this for my B-day.  We take a LOT of pictures of our girls and family... We love it.  It isn't anything professional, but the settings are so much fun to play around with and it has GREAT quality for the size.  The toy camera setting is fun... so is the monochrome setting.  We liked it so much... my mom bought my dad one for Christmas after he fell in love with our pictures!  GREAT buy!

Reviews.Title: Excellent digital point-and-shoot
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I have owned another Canon point-and-shoot and was very happy with it, so had no problem picking this out and I am likewise very happy with it. The body is textured to allow easy grip, the menus are all fairly standard, it is a very small camera but very easy (with the image stabilization too, I'm sure) to take very stable, long-shutter pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for pics and video
Reviews.Author: GtrGuy
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a compact camera that took great pics and could also shoot HD video.  I found it with the 300HS.  It's got great features for photos and handles low light very well.  It is VERY small...almost surprisingly so.It does a great job with HD video. I shot this music video with the 300HS and it looks great:[...]This tiny camera looked funny on top of a large tripod, but it got the job done.  I recommend it if you want a camera for photos AND video.

Reviews.Title: High Quality and Compact
Reviews.Author: M. Sheffieldndeals "amazindealscentral.com"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this prior to going away on vacation, which for many of you is a probable reason that you are looking at the camera. My overall experience was great. It has a high quality lens, something Canon is known for. It also has a decent sized screen for easy viewing after photographing. The fact that it is 12.1 megapixels is great for my purposes. A lot of people see the new cameras and see 14.1 megapixels, 16 megapixlels and more. Megapixels only help when enlarging a photo. You will have no problem enlarging a photo to almost any reasonable size with this camera. If you need anything bigger, I would recommend a Digital SLR. In summary, great camera, great price, overall a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Tiny, sturdy and high quality compact camera
Reviews.Author: Sean Clayton
Reviews.Content: Replaced an older Canon ELPH with this one and it hasn't disappointed.  This thing is tiny (about as small as they could make it without impacting useability) yet incredibly sturdy (metal construction) and - so unusual these days - is manufactured in Japan, not China.  It's small enough to take everywhere and takes infinitely better photos than a phone will with strong battery life.

Reviews.Title: Just recieved my Cannon PowerShot ELPH 300
Reviews.Author: Twinkie354
Reviews.Content: I recieved my camera today and I was so happy with shipping & product that I had to rush here to write a review. The look and feel are awesome, the Picture quality and the video quality is amazing. The price makes this all the better! Ive only have about 5-6 poin and shoot cameras from nikon, sony, 3 kodaks (I love their cameras and software) but this time I wanted to try something else. I read some review and convinced that this was a good buy... it was! I dont think youll have any regret unless your a professional that is comparing their $1,000 picture quality camera to this.

Reviews.Title: So Far...So Good!
Reviews.Author: categ3893
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of Canon digital cameras in general. The new, larger LCD screen is great. The pictures are great quality for the price. Lately, the majority of my photography has been of my new (hyper) puppy. She does not sit still but I am still able to get great photos! My only complaint is the "delete" function is not as easy (I think I have to press buttons at least 3 times and through 3 different 'screens' just to delete) as my last Canon.

Reviews.Title: If you don't have a pocket camera yet, this is the one to get.
Reviews.Author: TwistKickZ
Reviews.Content: I've been a long time user of Canon cameras and this one doesn't disappoint. So compact you won't feel the difference between it or your cell phone in your pocket.  Also very quick and easy to use. My experience with other point and shoots is that they all are kind of slow to turn on, snap pictures/ record video. Canons have always excelled at speed.The main reason I purchased it though was so I can take advantage of the 1080p 24fps movie recording.  Amazing quality that you don't expect out of such a camera. Also the extra wide angle lens makes movies feel more like one of the bigger expensive cameras out there. Image stabilization makes it more user friendly than a t2i. Here is an example of what a 1080p movie can look like -[...]There are some gripes though. The lens protector seems a little flimsy. I dented mine inward and it would not close properly until I 'undented' it back. Night shots can be tricky. I would also prefer the old way of deleting pictures on the old Elphs. This one adds an unneeded extra step to delete a picture. Also the movie recording can sometimes get iffy with the focus.These are just little things though. The camera is packed with features, takes great pics AND great video. 24mm wide angle lens and 1080p at 24fps, what else do you need at this price range?Just get it. =)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: seattle camera
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera!  Wonderful zoom, good ability to capture an image at sunrise or dusk without a flash, very nice viewing screen.  I am so happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: it's good
Reviews.Author: siming li
Reviews.Content: I got the camera very fast. And it looks very nice, easy to use. And the picture is good.at all, it's good for me.

Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lois611 "Lois611"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about a year ago and recently dropped it on a tile floor.  Oops, the zoom lens was out and it got smashed up pretty bad.  Unfortunately it couldn't be fixed.  So I bought another just like it.  It is nice and small for me to carry around in my purse.  It is so lightweight.  The zoom gives you some pretty good closeup shots.  I sell things on Ebay and need a good camera for detail.  This one works very well.  I wish it had a viewfinder like some of the old cameras but I've gotten used to doing without it.  The only problem is in the bright sun with sunglasses on, I can't see a blessed thing on the screen.  So I just take lots of photos and usually they are all great.

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: Pete B
Reviews.Content: seems to be a great little camera.  I was worryed about the batteries not being AA to easly replaced if needed, but the batterys last so long I haven't had that problem.  I have had several Canon pocket camera's and each one seems a little better than the last.Pete

Reviews.Title: Relied On Other Reviews and Couldn't Be Happier
Reviews.Author: LSU Goose
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for her birthday.  With the hundreds of cameras and options available, I opted to save hours of research by purchasing the camera with the best price and highest customer satisfaction rating.  My wife loves it. Easy to use and good pics.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Leslie A. Schliep
Reviews.Content: This small camera does everthing I want and more.crystl clear images and video.My wife especially likes the cameras thickness(or lack thereof)I would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot 300HS
Reviews.Author: JCM
Reviews.Content: This camera has been great so far. It is perfect for me as someone who doesn't know much yet about how to use all of the settings. The camera does all of the thinking for me and takes great pictures. The quality of the pictures is better than I expected and I have been very happy with this product so far. The camera is small and very light and easy to take around/out. The battery life was good. While traveling and taking many pictures all day, I managed to go about 6 days before having to re-charge the battery. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a small, easy-to-use camera.

Reviews.Title: canon power shot elph300
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: In the short time I have owned this camera I have not used this camera in other the automatic phase and I am pleased with what I have captured.  I am not a Photographer who is an expert with camera use, but I am satisfied at this early point of using the camera, that it can do anything, and I have to get up to speed on what this four oz camera can do.  As always I am impressed with Amazons delivery schedule etc.  The camera, extra rechargeable batteries and camera protective cover arrived as scheduled.  Now I have to get used to carrying the camera at all times and how to use it correctly.

Reviews.Title: Does its job well!
Reviews.Author: C. Whittle "WWII Movie Fan"
Reviews.Content: This purchase was made to replace my wife's point and shoot, which had died the previous day.  We have both been very impressed with the image quality, and highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Trance
Reviews.Content: I love this camera the video 1080p is really good the quality of the pictures is excellent very good camera for this price

Reviews.Title: most awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Howells
Reviews.Content: I bought this Canon Powershot Elph 300 HS camera because i needed to replace  my Canon powershot sd1400IS .  I received the new camera from Amazon and within a couple days someone stole it during my visit to Kauai,Hawaii..I was so upset !!!!..I liked this camera so much I immediately ordered the same one within the same week!!!!...My favorite feature is the zoom...video also has a zoom feature...I can get great detailed shots of little animals with this zoom feature...my Nikon D5000 cannot even get these kind of quality pictures!!  I have dropped this new camera a few times on the concrete....it has a few dents and a little crack on the screen from another incident of dropping it....  and the camera still works like a jewel...I am always going to buy Canon powershot cameras because I think it is a brilliant camera which takes gorgeous pictures!!!!  I go through camera like most people go through shoes because I am always traveling and taking pictures...Trust me ...can't go wrong with any Canon point and shoot camera!!!!

Reviews.Title: Margaret
Reviews.Author: M. Obenschain
Reviews.Content: Great camera; love it. I would buy it again. Great picture and very easy to carry  in purse.It arrived very quickly too.

Reviews.Title: Great, Quick, and solid camera
Reviews.Author: Garrett Campbell "gman gmc"
Reviews.Content: Not only is the camera FANTASTIC!!! Amazon continues to go above and beyond to make sure i am happy... i recieved the camera and the screen was cracked already in the top left corner, i ordered a replacement and the NEXT day i recieved another camera no charge and i hadn't even sent the previous one back... I just left the bad camera by the front door and Fedex oicked it up themselves...Great Service, Great camera crisp clear photos with many effects and features

Reviews.Title: Great camera in a small package
Reviews.Author: D. Viti
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic point and shoot camera. It's small enough to fit into my pocket and with a large SD card can shoot all the full HD video I could want while on vacation. It follows nicely in the ELPH line of quality dependable cameras.I'm currently using a 32 gig SD card. Might make sense to have another card and battery so you're always ready to capture the moment.

Reviews.Title: canon hs300
Reviews.Author: D. Yi
Reviews.Content: I love canons and did not go wrong in buying this one. Excellent picture quality and battery life. Lightweight and easy to use. Canon is the best personal camera company ever! :)

Reviews.Title: canon elph300hs
Reviews.Author: L. Jasek
Reviews.Content: bought this camera for it's portability to take on a hiking/trout fishing trip to colorado. kept it in my pocket and had no problem with it's dependability and ruggedness. of course, i didn't drop it or abuse it either. took about 300 shots over 6 days during the trip, plus reviewing them, and never charged the battery. works great and the pictures look good. i hesitated buying this camera based on some of the other reviews but finally took a chance. didn't have any of the problems some of the other reviewers had, maybe i happen to get a good one.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews on small point and shoot cameras, and eventually settled on this one.  I wasn't looking for fun novelty features, but this one seemed to have really fun features while also just being a solid canon camera.  It is the best of both worlds...I'm so glad I picked it!  Easy to take along (very small), fast start up/shoot time, awesome features (the miniature feature really works quite well), and am taking beautiful quality features.  I even took this camera out with my DSLR for an outdoor photo shoot, and most of the picture that will be used are from this camera!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: John J. Beatrice
Reviews.Content: We were shopping for a portable HD video camera and landed on this.  It performed better than I anticipated.  We just took it hiking in the Rockies and used it mainly for video.  It did everything we asked of it. I was surprised by the quality of the stills.  I own a Canon EOS digital rebel that I lug along on the trail.  The ELPH is now our trail camera. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Joann 101
Reviews.Content: After reading hundreds of reviews (which were very helpful), I decided to buy this camera and am so glad I did.  It's my first Canon camera, and I thought at first the menus were difficult.  But after playing around with them, I found they were pretty easy to use.  I haven't taken a lot of pictures, but I'm happy with the results....the pictures are sharp and skin tones are good.  The low-light capability is so good, I turn off the flash most of the time.  My photos have little noise at higher ISO settings.  As a side note, I read a review of the Canon ELPH 100  on dcresource (DCPR) site.  He said Continuous Mode activates the OIS system as soon as you halfway press the shutter release, which helps to compose the photos w/o camera shake.  The "shoot only" option doesn't turn it on until the photo is actually taken, which improves the performance of the OIS sytem.  I'm sure this applies to the ELPH 300 also.

Reviews.Title: Great Small camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Ciofalo-tedder
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for our trip to Balloon Fiesta in Albuquerque New Mexico because we didn't want to carry the 35 mm  Canon on the plane. Great photos, light weight. If taking alot of pictures order an extra battery. Great photos of the balloons and New Mexico's landscapes.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS
Reviews.Author: Studio Photos
Reviews.Content: Love the photos, the size and the color.  I have two professional cameras yet wanted a smallpocket/purse size for candid photos.  I got it.  I'm really happy with the images from such a tinygiant and I can find it because the red stands out.

Reviews.Title: good compact camera for the non-professional
Reviews.Author: cltbmore
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera after my old camera broke. I like the large LCD screen and it has a fast capture and good photo quality. The menu options are slightly more troublesome than other cameras I've used, for example it takes 3 clicks to delete a photo. But otherwise it is good for low light photos and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: the best!
Reviews.Author: Fit and Forty Something
Reviews.Content: Okay this is seriously the best point and shoot camera you can buy.  you barely have to adjust the camera for anything.  it takes perfect clear photos all the time.  I LOVE THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Willy Wailer
Reviews.Content: I have had 35MM SLRs, many digital cameras and camcorders.  My current love is the Canon S90 and this Elph 300 HS (my wife's) takes photos that I cannot tell from the S90, even when magnifying with Lightroom. The small size and acceptable zoom makes it perfect for any pocket.I bought it for the low light casual photos and I am not disappointed. Have not used the video as I have other equipment for that.  Highly recommend for $200Like all these small Canons, make sure you have a fully charged battery or two.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera.
Reviews.Author: A. Khan "aarijk"
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon DSLR system for well over a decade now and thought I'd pick this up as a convenient camera to carry around.Picture quality is amazing for outdoor use. It struggles a little in low light.I do have some issues with the camera trying to shoot wide open.But overall it does a good job.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: granthas "granthas"
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced a Canon 1400sd with more megapixels, but seems to take even better pictures.  The Zoom travels a little to fast to control well.  The video is excellent.  Still some shutter lag as is common with these type cameras, but better than previous models.  Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I took this camera with me to Greece this summer and it was amazing.  The HS makes it good in low light and the different shooting modes help tremendously.  There is a night mode for handheld that takes 3 pictures then merges them into one good shot.  There is a sport mode that takes crazy fast (for a compact camera) shots at 3MP each.  The auto is awesome too. I have always used Canon and will continue to after my great experiences with this camera. You won't be sorry!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for my mother. It took some reading to get to know how to use some of the features, but it is still much simpler to use than many cameras. It is very small, but produces excellent results. The video was equal to, or possibly even better, than the same video I took on my digital camcorder. I personally have an older small digital camera, an SLR digital camera, and a digital camcorder. However, I am seriously considering getting one of these to replace those in most situations.

Reviews.Title: Small camera, great pictures,the red is gorgeous!
Reviews.Author: S. Baker
Reviews.Content: This was kind of an impusle buy for me to replace my Canon Elph S110.  It has served me well for almost a decade, but the 2MP was limiting, and the batteries wore out and the aftermarket ones were only OK, and it had a max memory of 2GB as it used FAT.  It worked for 10 years (and still does), so I was sold on another Canon.Back in 2001, I had thought the S110 was impossibly small, but this is half the thickness.  There aren't many comments on the red model, but I think it's very sharp-looking and definitely not feminine.  I saw the black at Best Buy, and I don't think it felt all that nice...seems there's a reason the silver and red cost more; they put more money into the finish it seems.The pictures this takes are very nice, resolution is up to 4000*3000, or 12MP.  I thought my ancient S110 took good pics, but this is great.  Also, when I had bought this I thought the video would be a gimmick...but it does a GREAT job at that, too.I gave the menu a 3, because...I dunno.  It's not really easy to navigate and not too hard, but it's also a digital camera.  It is better than my S110, though.  It uses SD cards, but I chose to instead use MicroSD-in-the-adapter as it can be used in far more devices...SD-only devices are quite rare now. And to think SD was impossibly small 10 years ago!As for the camera, the screen is huge, and very nice.  I would advise putting a protective film on it, though...I had spare PDA screen protectors and I cut one to fit.  The camera is made of metal, just like my S110.  I'm not sure on the battery life, but it's probably sufficient.  I got a spare for use on day trips where I would take lots of pictures.  I find it amazing that the camera could be half the thickness of the (state of the art in 2001) S110, but the screen is 4 times larger, and the lens is also much larger.  The camera is Japanese-made, which is probably a good thing, considering most everything is made in China now.  US-made would be nice, but this is a Japanese company.I have not explored what the camera can do with manual settings, but the Auto settings work very well.  I'm not a photography-buff, and wanted something that would work well, and this delivered!

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy
Reviews.Author: R. Harry
Reviews.Content: Just got this as a replacement for an old sony cybershot.  I do a ton of research before I purchase and this was the best thing I could find in the price range.  The closest thing to it is the *panasonic* DMC-FH27 but I decided on this after looking at the interfaces and menus at the store.  The canon simply is much more straight forward and I was willing to sacrifice some zoom power and megapixels for something that didn't require hours with a manual and training session for my spouse.  Additionally, people have posted some youtube samples of the kind of video this takes and it is far superior to anything in its price range. This is important for me because we can't afford to go out and buy a specialized video camera and this will do a great job.Menu layout is intuitive.  The scene modes are AWESOME.  Very well done and despite being an amatuer I feel like this thing actually improves the quality of pictures I take. I have three picky critiques:1.  If you are going through the preview function to look at old pictures there is a quirky thing about getting back to taking pictures.  If you haven't done it long enough so that the lens retracts, you can hit the preview button again and it goes back to camera mode.  If you do it so long that the lens retracts, if you hit the preview button, the camera turns off.  This was very confusing for the first day and half of ownership.  It took a while to figure out exactly why hitting the same button would not do the same thing all the time.  So, if the lens retracts, you have to hit the capture button toget back to camera mode.  This was the only part about the interface that I thought was extremely dumb and not user friendly.2.  I was disappointed that some scenes and features in the manual set up could not be combines.  For example, you cannot do sepia and the miniatures scene simultaneously.  There are some sub functions as well that are not as intuitive as I would like.  For example, in the color highlight scene (takes black and white pic with one color retained), I have no idea how to choose which color I would like to keep and I'm not sure if I even can.  I tried this scene the other day and it chose what it felt was appropriate but it was not what I wanted.  I have yet to check the manual on that but it would be nice if it were self explanatory.3.  Battery life is a little short but recharge is only about 2 hrs. which is a third of the time it took on my last camera.
