Reviews.Content: I have a DSLR (Olympus E510) that I use for all my travel and really important events. I always take a "back up" camera and I wanted something small.  I took my new Canon Elph to Germany, Austria and Prague last month and it captured some great pictures that I could not get with my DSLR or I didn't want to carry it).  I love this Canon!  My oldest daughter had it first and praised it (she has a Nikon D3000 DSLR) and now I have purchased another one for my youngest daughter.  It takes really great pictures and is awesome in low light.  I highly recommend this camera for any one.  Definitely buy a little protective case to avoid any problems (which should be obvious).

Reviews.Title: Very good buy
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: For the money I think it is good buy. In my field of work I tend to abuse my equipment and so far the camera hasbeen doing pretty good. Plus the quality of the picture are very good for the price. this is my 3 canon so far my second one I droped it and is all put together with tape and still works.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kim Anehall "www.cinematica.org"
Reviews.Content: The Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black) is a nice and user friendly camera with great options and great image quality.  I opened the box and charge the battery for 30 min and have used the camera so far for about 1000 photos.  I use it for my work (I am a teacher) and for my business, as I provide direct feedback to clients and students with what we do.  It is definitely worth the money and I used to use the Canon 90S PowerShot before, but a student dropped it and broke it so this replacement camera works great for what I need it for.  Yet, the Canon 90S PowerShot was great, but not easy to use for students as the Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black). In essence, a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Larzman "tech hobbyist"
Reviews.Content: this requires a Class 6 SD memory card in case anyone is wondering, its on page 112 of the manual (in small print).

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Alinka
Reviews.Content: Im a canon fan, but they come out with a new camera every month it seems like. I have had 5 point and shoot from the elph series of canon in the past 5 years and I think that this one is truly the best. It takes great pictures with a ton of really good settings to use and has 1080p HD video. Its perfect to carry around and for the photographer that loves a quality photo without having to buy the $800+ cameras. Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: R. Votaw "Jules"
Reviews.Content: I have owned 3 Canon point-and-shoot cameras and liked them all.  I bought this one as a gift, and liked it so much I decided to buy another one for myself.  It's well built and takes good quality photos.  I'll mention one item that has been commented on in other reviews: the one I bought as a gift was silver.  It looks nice and the external paint surface is smooth.  The one I bought for myself is black.  It looks classic, but the paint surface is rough - kind of like fine grain sandpaper.  I wasn't sure I would like it, but after using it, I realize I like it better than the smooth paint surface.  The rough surface provides some gripiness that makes the camera feel firmer in your hands.  If you like smooth, get silver.  If you like rough, get black.  Not sure whether the red one is smooth or rough.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from our old Digital Camers
Reviews.Author: RudeDog
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos & videos.  We'd recently brought a new puppy home with us who moves faster than we can get a picture of her that's not blurred.  The video & software that come with this model are outstanding.  I can now take a video of her and with the software that came with the camera freeze frames, save individual frames, print them out, email, download to our ipod, etc.  Gave it only 3 stars on Design layout ... the lower right corner on the back of the camera has so many setting buttons that I continue to accidentally touch while pointing & shooting to take a picture.  It's annoying, but since everything else is a 5 STAR I can learn to live with it.Over the weekend I used this camera to take photos of an art exhibit ... it was hosted in a showroom of a blown glass business that specializes in high-end hand blown glass pendants lights, so needless to say the setting although it was an evening event & had no natural light, the photos turned out wonderful. Colors were true to the artwork and none of them were washed out.I wanted a point-and-shoot camera that took really good photos and that's what I got.

Reviews.Title: Good things come in small packages
Reviews.Author: GS "GS"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is better than my other bigger and pricier camera. The size is unbeatable making it very portable and convenient. It fits easily in the pocket, very easy to use and did I mention the picture quality? All in all, Fabulous!! I would definitely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, small camera; great value. Zooms in video.
Reviews.Author: Emie
Reviews.Content: This is a very well-designed camera. Received the packaged promptly as described by Amazon.com.The camera has a mild 'gritty' feel to it (to aid in grip); this is well-documented by fellow reviewers on this page.The picture quality is top-notch. The video quality is fascinating, especially when viewing with HDMI cable on our LED TV (the side port has a mini-HDMI out, as well as the mini-USB for communication w/ your computer). You are also able to zoom while in video mode, which sets the 300hs apart from it's friend the 100hs.The LCD and buttons in the rear-panel are intuitive, as is the selection menu for the various aspects of camera control.The menu and features are similar to other Canon camera products.The camera is small and neatly packed; My hands are above-average sized and the camera's size is about 1/3 of my hand. Therefore, it takes a a few shots to get used to not getting your fingers in the way of the flash, lens and microphone.  The microphone is located on the top panel, with two small holes.One strategy of getting to know the camera prior to your purchase is to go to a local electronics store and seeing the camera (or a similar one) first hand.As with any camera or electronic purchase, it's best to find one that fits your needs.Remember this camera will take high-quality pictures and videos, which will translate to increased power consumption (consider one or two back-up batteries (size/type: NB-4L) and mandate high-capacity memory cards.Our fellow reviewers have gone into much greater depth and all have done a fantastic job at thorough explanation.I hope this review serves as a validation to the quality and value of the Canon ELPH 300hs. Enjoy your continued market research, I hope you find the camera you desire.

Reviews.Title: PowerShot ELPH 300
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Very good camera.  Highly recommended. Used it in Australia and it worked great. Pictures are very good, and the camera has all the flexibility needed.

Reviews.Title: Small and handy
Reviews.Author: W. Steve Queen
Reviews.Content: I am a horse racing photographer.  I was needing a camera to have in my pocket, just in case.  I shoot with Canon equipment.  I trust Canon.  I love the little thing.  Fits perfectly for what I need.  Not as great as my bid DSLR camera,  but quick and handy.  Works super, photos sharp, amazes me.

Reviews.Title: A super little camera
Reviews.Author: Jon S. Turner "Jon Turner"
Reviews.Content: I get tired of lugging around the big DSLR and purchased this on a whim, it is truly a great camera and really takes incredible shots.  Much, much better shots that you can get on a camera phone.  Even in quick shots, in tough lighting conditions--it produces great shots.  Could be the perfect "point and shoot".  Enough advanced settings for special occasions, but, honestly, even in some bizarre situations, still comes out with great pictures, so, why do you need all the extra settings?  Quickly becoming my favorite camera.  The external case does have an odd "sandpaper" type feel, but, I suspect this will smooth out and it does keep it from feeling "slick".

Reviews.Title: Canon e3 error after 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: sandramohun
Reviews.Content: After having the camera for 3 weeks and taking good care of it, I got an e3 error. Software problem. Never once dropped it but there was an internal software problem. Just sent it in to be fixed after owning it for 3 weeks. It works for 60 sec before a message comes up saying e3 error and then it shuts off. I've had 4 canon powershot cameras and this is my first time experiencing this type of problem but I trust canon and always come back to it. I always recommend canon over other makers and this is the first time I've had a problem with a canon camera that wasn't self-induced. It should be fine once it's fixed and shipped back to me. Theres a one year warranty and canon's customer service is very helpful. I'll always stick with canon.

Reviews.Title: Great size and video, poor image quality
Reviews.Author: ClassicsFan
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reading all the positive reviews here. Overall, I can say that I'm kinda satisfied given that I wanted a small pocket-sized camera that takes good video WITH optical zoom. I wasnt really looking for or expecting great photos.PROS :1. It fits into my purse beautifully, is light and doesnt weigh down my purse (with all the other junk inside it), and form factor is wonderfully portable. Moms : you will love this! :-)2. Video with optical zoom on a small point and shoot!! Yoohoo! This is the main reason I bought it. Of course, you have to hold the camera very steady otherwise there is video-shake, but that is to be expected since this is such a tiny camera. I like the slow 5X optical zoom, because it doesnt cause jumpy video. So far, I've taken lots of video of my kid using this, and quality is very acceptable for my standards (which are not very high).CONS :1. The photos that I've taken so far are really disappointing. I have read other reviews saying they got very good pics, so that is leading me to wonder if I'm doing something wrong here. I cant beleive that a Canon would take grainy pics (even in broad daylight, shooting in Auto mode with largest resolution). Not that I'm expecting DSLR quality, mind you, but I was really surprised at the lack of color richness and sharpness. Can someone please let me know if I'm missing something here? I've owned a Nikon Coolpix point and shoot in the past which took way better photos than this one.Overall, since it meets my specific needs, I'm keeping this camera. But if someone is looking for an all-in-one point and shoot that takes both good pics and video, then look elsewhere!

Reviews.Title: Great Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: James Wilson
Reviews.Content: Photos are very good quality.  A little slower on the autofocus than I'd prefer sometimes.  Don't understand the issue some folks have with the very lightly textured black finish.  I think it makes it less likely to slip in your hand.

Reviews.Title: Good compact camera!
Reviews.Author: Nagaraju
Reviews.Content: We have captured some great good pics, it is good outdoors but inside the interiors it is not that good unless we have bright light is available. I recommend this as it is light weight and takes good pictures outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Snazzy Quality Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Diana West
Reviews.Content: I adore this camera and STILL use it on a regular basis. When I first purchased it, I received numerous compliments on the color --red -- which I had thought might be too flashy, but turned out to be quite elegant.This is a compact camera with excellent photo quality for a point-and-shoot, which is what I need when I'm on the go.

Reviews.Title: Lens doesn't close-black smudge
Reviews.Author: Kimmerre
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera just over a year. My previous cannon camera had an issue where the lens cover wouldn't close and open properly and the exact same thing happened to this camera, just a few months into owning it. Obviously Canon camera's aren't as good as they used to be. So now when I turn the camera off, I have to slam it against my hand to get the lens cover to shut, or use my finger nails to shut it (causing finger prints on the lens).As of today, when I turn it on the lens doesn't open up at all and I have to pry it open. Exact same thing that happened to my last cannon, which was the previous model.I had read reviews before purchasing about a black smudge in the corner of the screen due to the flash being too close (I think) and that is also true. On certain settings you will get the black smudge in the corner on every single one of your pictures.Overall it takes great pictures, but Canon clearly doesn't care about their products to be having the same issues in several varieties over the years, also...how do you go about selling a camera that produces black smudges on the pictures?! Really Canon?!

Reviews.Title: easily broken, better get insurance
Reviews.Author: businesschic "businesschic"
Reviews.Content: This is not a high quality camera, and breaks easy.  But I like it because I've had 5 of this type (in 3 years), and am used to it's functionality.  The lens gets stuck and broken easily from grains of dust or dropping or typical wear (3 got stuck in this way).  If you touch the any button with damn hands the moisture goes inside and ruins them (1).  I am an avid traveler, and for the price I can replace them, and take them anywhere with enough confidence.  I like the compact size and extra zoom power too.

Reviews.Title: my favorite
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: This camera is truly my favorite go to small camera. I am constantly using it and never have any problems!! I would recommend this camera to anyone who is like me and never wants to miss a moment!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Ralph Gray
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a previous camera of the same type which I used for 3 years. The photo quality was excellent. I liked the compact size even with the underwater housing. With the low light rating I did not need an external flash. The Cannon software was great for editing photos to adjust the light and color. There was a minor problem with one corner of the screen fogging up, but did not affect the operation. Eventually the internal flash stopped working, which necessitated replacing the camera.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Michael "Avid Listener!"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera that will fit in you pocket or purse.  Plenty of setting options and great pictures with 12.1 mega-pixel image engine.I would recommend this model to anyone wanting a small camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Natalia A.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this one a couple years ago and its still working great. It's the perfect size for a pocket camera, has a great zoom and different features. I'm planning on using it until it doesn't work anymore, but I know my boyfriend has an older model of this one and he purchase it in 2009-2010 and keeps working amazingly. I totally recommend buying this product, specially if you are like me: likes to take pictures but don't know a whole lot about cameras and wants a comfortable, yet incredible picture taker.Compré esta cámara un par de años atrás y sigue funcionando increíblemente. Tiene el tamaño perfecto para una cámara "pocket", tiene un zoom muy bueno y diferentes opciones. Planeo usarla hasta que ya no funcione, pero mi enamorado (novio) tiene un modelo más antiguo que la mía, que la compró en el 2009-2010 y sigue funcionando de maravilla. Recomiendo comprar este producto, especialmente si eres como yo: me gusta tomar fotos pero no sé demasiado sobre cámaras y quiero una cámara cómoda pero que tome fotos increíbles.

Reviews.Title: Best powerShot camera for the price
Reviews.Author: ED Z.
Reviews.Content: This camera takes quality photos and there are so many scene settings.  Beautiful daylight pictures and great in low light also.A good buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: More pixels than my iphone
Reviews.Author: tck "marty"
Reviews.Content: Takes better pictures than my iphone.  Important if you want to enlarge or do other things.  I had one like this for only 2 years and it quit working.  I hope this one does better.  When it works, it's great.  (e.g., I was able to set a fast shutter speed to capture a glacier calving in a series of photos.  Of course it would do HD movie, too.)

Reviews.Title: A great little camera
Reviews.Author: emily
Reviews.Content: It always takes such flattering pictures when set to automatic - I suppose the technology that balances the color, light and contrast is just that well-tuned! I have seen pictures from a lot of friend's point-and-shoots over the years and my pictures are always the most colorful and well-balanced.

Reviews.Title: Great little compact camera with video
Reviews.Author: Joel Godin
Reviews.Content: Love the pics and video this produces.  Very compact, fits in your pocket.Good color on pics and video. Highly recommend this one.  Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: This camera is real quality takes amazing pics. Its small and compact which makes it easy to walk around with. I have it for almost 2 years and no issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Price for an Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Johnson
Reviews.Content: Ok , I am not rich so I can't afford really really nice cameras such as the Canon T3i , which I really want ! & I really  want to start a YouTube channel & blog.So I did some research & I heard that this camera has amazing quality , & to my surprise they were absolutely right ! & when I seen the price I knew I couldn''t pass it up !This camera is so AMAZING , I can't express how much I love it ! It takes proffesional pics , awesome videos & the sound on it is superb !I can't go anywhere without having this camera, its almost as they messed up the price , because 200 bucks for good of a camera is an AWESOME DEAL !You guys can't pass up on this amazing deal ! -Get it now guys !

Reviews.Title: Good for my abilities
Reviews.Author: HankMan
Reviews.Content: Technology doesn't scare me, and so this is a good choice. Today's cameras are not necessarily the most intuitive to use. But after getting used to the features, and an occasional reference to the manual or the built-in help feature (which I like) I picked up OK on this camera and i like it. Although I must say that i do not use all of the available features.

Reviews.Title: Little red powerful excellant Cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: Melodie Adams
Reviews.Content: I love the small size and it takes the most beautiful pictures, both shots and video!! it has a great zoom lens. it took me awhile to figure out how to use it.  The small size is awesome, and it is every bit as good as my bigger real expensive camera! I really love this little but powerful camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for taking video while hiking. I love how quick you can take a picture or video.Great quality.

Reviews.Title: takes great photos and a beating
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I took thousands of pictures over a couple years traveling around africa and europe and this little camera stood up to the beating and delivered some great photos. It finally broke now that the lens cover will no longer shut, but it served me well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Unit
Reviews.Author: Robert Owens
Reviews.Content: I have owned many point-and-shoot digital cameras.  I always have them on me and take lots of candid shots wherever we are.  Generally speaking, these cameras last between a year and two for about 20,000 shutter clicks.This Canon was a little bit better than that.  I am at 27 months and a little over 20,000 shots.  Presently, the lens will not zoom.  It still takes photographs.This camera is solidly-built.  The menus are easy to maneuver.  There are scenes, etc.  I don't get too into all that, although the lighting options are good and make a difference.I am looking for a replacement for this camera but may just end up purchasing another one just like it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Terry Blocher
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great size and takes amazing pictures.  It is easy to use. I would recommend to anyone who needs an affordable camera for everyday work and play pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the size.
Reviews.Author: MrLance
Reviews.Content: But I have to remove one star for poor low light performance.  Not sure another camera this size would do any better though.  I also don't like that it does 24p video in 1080 mode instead of the more standard 30p (or 60i) which it does support for 720 mode.I do like the 5x zoom and that it is so compact.  Takes great pictures outdoors in full light.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera, but stopped turning on
Reviews.Author: Aleece Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing little camera until it stopped turning on.With fully charged batteries, it started to take about 10 minutes to get the camera to notice that it had a power source. Once I got the camera to turn on once, it would continue turning off and on until the battery was dead. After playing this game with it for about 2 weeks, it just stopped turning on all together.Before this power problem, I was in love with this camera, except for graininess at the full zoom, I loved the features it offered and how small it was. The screen resolution was amazing and 9 times out of 10 my photos looked fabulous.I would recommend getting the 2 or 3 year SquareTrade warranty if you buy this camera. My one year warranty ran out just before I encountered problems but I filed a claim with SquareTrade and upon receiving my camera they are going to send me a full refund for what I paid for it. I am in no way an affiliate or salesman of SquareTrade, I just want to let you know that this extended warranty service really helped me with this product.Overall great camera, I recommend it, just get yourself a little extra insurance.

Reviews.Title: great pics and video...long battery life
Reviews.Author: pigdawg_99
Reviews.Content: Takes great pics..battery lasts long and the video is very good too. Small and compact with a nice texture to avoid slipping from your hands. Would have received 5 stars but the first one I received had to be sent back because the lens cover stopped working. Canon took care of the problem with a replacement for free under their warranty.

Reviews.Title: Really nice, takes great pictures, very good low light
Reviews.Author: BBQ Gamer
Reviews.Content: My friends thought it was silly to buy a camera when virtually all of our phones have cameras on them now.I put this side by side with my smartphone and the pictures on this camera are much nicer.  My wife is the primary user and she loves it.  We use it in low light areas quite a bit and it works very well.  I don't use it much but when I do its easy for me to figure out how to do what I want on it.  It is intuitive enough for me.It is deceptively small.  We are very happy with this camera and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: super fast
Reviews.Author: Dario Cazares
Reviews.Content: super fast camera for a point and shot is excelente also de detail is beatifull. recomended for low budget and excellent quality

Reviews.Title: Great, thin little camera
Reviews.Author: Ornot "Ornot"
Reviews.Content: Takes really nice pictures and video (all settings on highest). My wife who is a tenchnophobe was able to use BOTH functions and learned how to view and delete with very little instruction.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Dominic A. Reina
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to use on the road for real estate.  Small, lightweight and easy to use.  Takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: armoandleo
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to a family member and she absolutely loves it.  She's becoming quite the photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: God's Girl
Reviews.Content: Great quality and great pics! So compact and easy to use. Great buy for the money. Would recommend if your looking for a reasonably priced camera that gives great quality pictures

Reviews.Title: A recommended buy if you can tolerate delayed action
Reviews.Author: F. Mervin Baker
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera - takes clear pictures and is easy to use. My big complaint, which I knew before purchasing, is that it is slow respond and you sometimes lose the peak moment of the very shot you want. If not for that I would give it a five star rating. Review submitted by Patricia Baker (not F. Mervin Baker).

Reviews.Title: A Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: deearne
Reviews.Content: This camera has served me well.  I've gotten some great shots with it.  It has held up well through all the abuse I have put it through.  I've been using only Canon cameras for many years and have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: bought three of these ... worth money spent.
Reviews.Author: MaterJabbi
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these camera's, no complains it contains all the features need for anyone who does want to worry about adjusting settings and configuration. both pictures and videos quality is very nice/.

Reviews.Title: Quality product for price
Reviews.Author: J.R. "J.R."
Reviews.Content: Portable, price and the quality of photos are clear. It is banged up from all my travels but still a quality product for the price.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Anita Crosby
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It is easy to use and the pictures are nice.  Good resolution for average use.  Zooms in for close ups, easy movie button for short videos, and flash seems to turn on at right time.  Love the pictures and videos so far.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Dale
Reviews.Content: Very reliable camera when skiing, fly fishing, backpacking, and for all occasions. Got it just after it had come out. Excellent res photos & video. Ordered this to replace exact same one that we broke with a fall while bkpking (landed right on it)...coulda fixed but only a little more for a new one. Would buy again if we mess this one up.12/22/13: Just had ? From someone about type of cards this uses. I always use sdhc, but it will also use: sd, sdhc, MultiMedia, MMC+, HC MMC+, & Eye-FI cards , per Getting Started' manual.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: bruce.alethea
Reviews.Content: Great performance. Super pics. Super compact. I mainly take pics of my active boys. Love that it's always in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Cainey
Reviews.Content: These are great cameras. They are ease to use. We purchased the cameras for our sales staff. They like the size and the ease of use. We now have 6 of the Canon Power Shots.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: This camera takes GREAT pictures and HD videos!  I had an older Powershot ELPH, and it died after 8 years and a lightening storm, so I got another one. I am very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Video! DONT HESITATE
Reviews.Author: Shiv
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great i got it for the 1080p Video recording and it its GREAT. Crystal clear videos almost like a cinematic flow to it. Little guy fits right in your pocket and you can bring it anywhere!

Reviews.Title: Super Pictures
Reviews.Author: T. M. Girvin "Nomad"
Reviews.Content: Great product at an afordable price. The adjustments in manual mode allow the user to take extreme high quality photos that can compeat with the very expensive cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great photos
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos in normal and low light.  A reasonably priced underwater housing is available to make it even more versatile.

Reviews.Title: Pocket camera not for the pocket
Reviews.Author: Ezgi Baloglu "DNA cat"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a fantastic little piece of electronics that lets you take photos in almost every situation.  HOWEVER, my main beef with it is that, while it's advertised as a pocket camera, my experience is that keeping it in your pocket will ruin it.I shoot pictures all the time with many different cameras-SLRs, DSLRs, one-time film, Polaroid, and this one.  I always have a camera ready, but this camera that fits in my pocket is one that I take almost everywhere.  The problem is that the lens cover can be easily opened when rubbing on the liner of the pocket, which it has to do when going in and out of the pocket.  I have taken it out many times to find one of the two halves open and that allows dust inside.  Over many months, dust has gotten into the workings of the lens and now when I zoom, a constellation of grey splotches appear all over the image.  Now it's at the point where dust won't allow one of the halves to close at all with some prodding from my finger. Yes, it is my fault for not take the best care of it, but having the camera at the ready in my pocket lets me take a picture in 2 seconds from taking it out and pushing the power button while bringing it up to look at.  No lost pictures, which would happen if I always kept it in a case.So, it's something to consider, even though this model is now obsolete.  It takes fantastic photos like I said and I think I'll buy another model just like it.  I like the quality of the camera and the photos it takes and I also like that it's NOT touch screen and it's NOT WI-FI (I don't always want to be connected).  I'll just take better care of it.  I do wish that the lens cover was as sturdy as my SD 770IS was.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: this is the second one of these I have purchased. My first one went swimming in a lake, put it in rice and it worked great again except for the date had to be reset every time the battery was changed. It is a very simple camera, easy to use and can be more complex if a person is so inclined. Takes great pictures, exeptionally wide angle comes in handy for taking pics of buildings and landscape that never before fit into one pic but had to be taken as a panorama.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: ldw120
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera that I bought for my girlfriend. The zoom feature works really well. Hooks up and downloads to my computer with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Fun point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: MT.Paradise
Reviews.Content: Not a professional photographer, but I love how simple this camera is. The auto setting is good quality for amateurs. It has a number of settings to choose from in manual mode. Great point and shoot! It has a good battery life, not having to charge it all the time when I use it regularly. Definitely a good value for me!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, only needs more zoom
Reviews.Author: tolarteh
Reviews.Content: I have a Lumix very similar to this Canon, and the only thing I miss from it is the big zoom. In any other area the Canon excels, with great colors, intelligent focus and all the features of a great pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: greatest lil cam
Reviews.Author: mrfla
Reviews.Content: the camera itself is an amazing and small piece of equipment. puts the date on your pics, the video is better than my video camera, zoom is pretty outstanding, a buttload of settings. i bought a refurb and i tell you it is new!! shipment was quick and safe. very pleased with the vendor and the camera. didn't cate for the newer versions of this model, so i bought this one as one for me so now we have matching cameras, cute ain't it???

Reviews.Title: Can handle abuse somewhat.
Reviews.Author: Jenius
Reviews.Content: I've taken this around the world with me, through jungle, desert, freezing altitudes, through dusty colour runs, and numerous festivals and it has still survived albeit a bit worn from overuse. After a year of intensive usage, the zoom function on the lense has given way in manual mode but can still function somewhat in the auto setting. Most things aren't built to last these days but given the excess I've taken this Canon to, I am quite happy it can still take a decent picture.

Reviews.Title: Great quality!
Reviews.Author: Pauline
Reviews.Content: This is by far the nicest digital camera i own! It has a very wide screen and takes picture that it true to its color. The zoom is very well as well except it always makes this weird noise when i zoom while recording. Maybe its just my camera. After about 3 days of having it, there was a scratch on the screen and i dont know how that got there because i put it in a separate pocket with nothing in there but a camera in my purse. overall, i like it but be sure to have a camera case! My fault for not getting one sooner.

Reviews.Title: JUST WHAT I WANTED
Reviews.Author: Jenny Kim
Reviews.Content: I had purchase the powershot 2 years ago and it finally broke.I was elated when this camera arrived today because I used it at one of my monumental events.I love that it records and takes pictures and especially the hi speed bursts.Thank you for your impeccable timing on the delivery.From New York to Los Angeles in 5 days.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joan D. Mandell
Reviews.Content: We take all our pictures with this camera.  We also use the case we purchased with it.  Love the quality of pictures

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Jaclyn King
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect camera for my Husband and I. The only complaint I have is sometimes the pictures on the screen do not look that great... but as soon as you print them out they look awesome. I think it is a great camera for the price. We love it!

Reviews.Title: Super camera
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Love this little guy. Fits easily in pocket. Easy to use. Battery lasts and lasts. Pics are nice. Wife is pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for everyday use
Reviews.Author: H. Elting
Reviews.Content: As usual, I read a million reviews and settled on this camera. I wanted a camera to take pictures of my family, etc.I may branch out one day and experiment with all the features, but it takes great pictures with little fuss. Everyone who sees the pictures comment on the quality of the photos.I was surprised at how small this camera is.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Naomi Evarts Hurley
Reviews.Content: I had an older Cannon Powershot, but wanted to upgrade so bought this one. It's a great little camera to take on vacation or out and about. Strong battery life, good video quality and the photos turn out really nice.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for the price. I used to sell these at the retail store that I work for, but they were discontinued around a year ago or so. However when we had them in stock I would recommend them all the time, and customers and co-workers alike were always happy with their performance.Look at the reviews here, look at the reviews pretty much anywhere and you will see its one of the best point and shoot cameras in its price range. This camera is simple enough for novices to use (auto mode, literally point and shoot, still get great pics), yet has some useful features for those who may be more camera savvy. I wont hesitate to buy it for or recommend it again to anyone who asks for a good, cheap point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: 1st was stolen, so got another one just like it
Reviews.Author: William Shakespeare "The Bard"
Reviews.Content: Looked at the market place extensively almost a year after getting the first one and could not find a one better than this one.  Canon does a great job on small point & shoot cameras.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I love my Camera it is small enough to fit in the case and in my purse to take anywhere. I took on vacation and loved the ease of taking pictures as well point and shot is for me. It will be for you too, if you want a no nonsense Camera buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Easy  to use camera
Reviews.Author: grump
Reviews.Content: have had this for about 3 years and still happy with itVery handy to keep in purse , good to use when in the storelooking at something you want to buy

Reviews.Title: It is simple to use and the photos are very good quality.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Rucker
Reviews.Content: The only improvement I would add is a more comprehensive manual with the camera. Symbols flash on the screen that I do not know what they are.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for point n shoot
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera because I needed a quick replacement for one that broke.  It takes a nice picture -- I'm no photographer, but for me it works great.

Reviews.Title: Love my Camera
Reviews.Author: N. Graber "Talie"
Reviews.Content: I love my little camera.  This camera is little and at first I was a little nervous about using it.  It works great and takes excellent shots.  I like how it is little and it can easily fit into my pants pocket if I need it to be there.  I like the look of this camera as well and I always get compliments on it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, questionable download disk
Reviews.Author: Jo Taylor
Reviews.Content: Admittedly I have an old computer, but downloading the Canon disk made it crash so I had to remove it.  Looks like it has some good stuff on it, though, so I will keep it for future use.

Reviews.Title: Easy guide
Reviews.Author: glenda Pohl
Reviews.Content: The instructions was easy to follow and the pictures are turning out great. The small size makes it nice to take every where.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Rita Matuz
Reviews.Content: Nice size for travel. Takes great pictures. Battery life is great, recharges fast! Family member has the same one. We love it!

Reviews.Title: compact
Reviews.Author: Stacy Wagner
Reviews.Content: great quality of pictures and nice and compact that it can fit in your pocket.  The features it has are quite amazing.

Reviews.Title: Wow- they packed it all in this little camera!
Reviews.Author: T. Hensley "tjh1279"
Reviews.Content: Canon is simply the best.  This little gem can take the best photos, and I absolutely love the new sensor for low lighting shots.  The wide angle lens really makes every shot you take seem more realistic as well.  I haven't had time to try out the video quality yet, but I can only imagine it will be great, as other reviewers have commented on.  I bought this one to take the place of a three year old Nikon Coolpix touchscreen camera.  The battery doors on them had a common problem which mine eventually succumbed to,  so I decided to trade up for this Canon.  The Elph 300 HS did not disappoint me.  It is so small, I can put it in an old cell phone case that I had, or even inside a Fossil wristlet that I carry sometimes.  I'm taking it on vacation in two weeks to Europe for a river cruise there.  I plan to take lots of shots as it will be with me at all times.  That's what is so great about the size of it.  No weight to lug, not big or bulky at all, and you still get awesome photos.  The software cd that comes with it makes transfer of photos a breeze.  Even that is much better than the Nikon transfer software.  For the price range of around $150-200, this one is a definite contender.  You should consider it if you don't want your smartphone battery dying on you in the middle of a great vacation.  The battery lasts quite a long time so I plan to get through each day without any problems.  There is a website that you can compare the different Canon cameras, because there are so many it's mind boggling.  Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Q "QrS"
Reviews.Content: Can't be beaten for the price. My only complaint is the lack of a viewfinder, but that's the norm these days.

Reviews.Title: Small / Covert!
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: If this is an answer to Cell Phone Cameras due to their pocketability, I think they nailed it. I can put this bad boy in my pocket and think it's a phone.When I hold on to the camera itself, it doesn't feel fragil - but rather, sturdy and "Tight". No loose parts or thin wall feeling.I like the slow motion camera recording - but it can't do it for long periods though as it heats up and uses a lot of battery in the process!Pictures turn out great most all the time. Inside pictures take a little more time to focus (half pressing the shutter button and then letting go, and then half pressing again till it focuses correctly). Outdoor pictures are great! I just wish there was a way to stop all camera pre-processing of the pictures I take and allow me to modify the color if it needs it.I've had this camera for almost 2 years now and the only things that have gone wrong are: The shutter for the lens wouldn't shut all the way, leaving the lens exposed. The other problem that happened was that it records a motor noise when I record video when zooming. The first problem was resolved with Cannon itself due to it being within the one year warranty period (they gave me a refurbished camera + all the original stuff that came with the camera in the first place! From the battery to the charger and cables! Lovin' it!... and just a note, 10 months after ownership, I had that problem with the lens shutter not working correctly). The second problem is in the middle of being resolved with the company I got the added insurance from.It doesn't take long for it to turn on, resulting in me taking pictures at work of people doing things they'd not want reminded of later (Like running in a field / sleeping on the job / goofing off...). Taking pictures doesn't have to be fun for both parties - just me.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Judith A Corman
Reviews.Content: Not quite as user friendly as my last one.  it was a Canon S500.  New models should be easier to use - not more difficult

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera-meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: Cliff
Reviews.Content: I have been putting the Canon ELPH 300 HS through its paces since buying it a few weeks ago and so far I am very happy with the decision.Among the things I read in other reviews:Fast start up:  very true.  It is ready to snap in less than a secondNumber of images per battery charge:  I took over 200 images without flash and the battery charge indicator had not gone down.  I am sure flash will affect that, but for outdoors and low light pics in museums, etc. it will be great.Picture quality:  excellent.  The 12mp make the images very detailed especially compared to my older 5mp camera.Low Light:  very good.  I have taken many pictures of paintings and prints inside my house with no light and they are all very good.  It should be excellent in museums this summer.Image focus:  excellent.  The focus boxes come up quickly when the shutter button is pressed half way down and I have had no pictures out of focus once I get the focus boxes to show.Rough Texture:  I bought the black 330 HS. A lot has been made of the "new" texture but it is only slightly textured and very easy to hold.  I think it is a big improvement.Among things that I have not read in other reviews:Zoom setting: There is a setting that disables digital zoom so that when you zoom it is only within the optical zoom.  This is a lot better than my old camera with which I had to be careful not to "enter" the digital zoom as the picture became pixelated when you did.  This may be standard in all cameras now, but I didn't have it on my old camera.Charger weight:  Is only 2oz.  I was slightly concerned that it would weigh more.  It is only 7/8" x 3.5" x 2 1/8" and will be very handy to carry when traveling. It plugs directly into the wall and handles 100-240v so can be plugged into foreign plugs with only the simple adapters.  We may not have to take our "brick" transformer this year.Flash turn off:  This is on the main function setting on the back of the camera and is very easy to switch quickly when entering a museum that does not allow flash pictures.  A nice big icon that is always present indicates flash on or off.Auto Setting:  So far it seems that I can take all my pictures with this setting with the ability to turn the flash on and off.  My old camera required me to go into the "special" pictures and choose "museum" to turn the flash off and get low light pictures which were often pixelated.Video:  I have not used a lot of video before, but this camera is very easy to use for video.  Push one button on the back and you are taking video.  Push it again to stop.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT little camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Ratzlaff
Reviews.Content: I have a big Nikkon with assorted lenses but for a recent overseas trip I knew I wanted to take a small camera that would fit in a pocket or a purse.  The Canon Powershot fit the bill and worked great. I'm very happy with the quality of the photos. I haven't figured out all the features yet, but I have a feeling this camera is going to see a lot more use than my big one!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: fersakyn
Reviews.Content: I love Canon cameras. I tried Nikon for a while, but there was some kind of fundamental color problem that I couldn't fix.

Reviews.Title: I loved
Reviews.Author: CRISTINA SOUZA VIEIRA
Reviews.Content: I loved the product of great quality would buy again . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Very nice and budget friendly camera.
Reviews.Author: Sridharan Gopalan
Reviews.Content: I thought of investing a very little amount in buying a camera, after research and homework and after reading reviews from multiple sources, we decided to buy this camera and it's very crystal clear and image quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent compact camera
Reviews.Author: A. Evans "A E"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  The small size means I can put it in my pocket.  I do with the zoom was better but that's a personal preference.

Reviews.Title: Merry XMAS
Reviews.Author: Robnee
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife over a year ago. She is very pleased with her Canon and takes it everywhere with her. It takes great pictures and she likes the the HDMI connection on it to scroll through her photos on our HDMI capable tv.

Reviews.Title: Good little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: mdchen
Reviews.Content: Guilty admission / disclaimer:  I haven't read the manual yet, so some of the problems I've experienced may be due to user ignorance.This replaced the ELPH I bought in 2004.  I stuck with ELPH for the small size and because my previous ELPH took crisp photos with beautiful color.  I have yet to make prints from this camera, although they look great after uploading to iPhoto.I bought this for backpacking trips and other outdoor endeavors where an iPhone doesn't come close to achieving the desired effect.  The startup time on this ELPH is very fast.  It definitely handles low light very well, although it does try to "think" too much.  It is often necessary to point the lens at a brighter or darker area to achieve the desired lighting effect while in Auto.  The alternative would be to try each of the many programmable settings for each shot, although this somewhat defeats the purpose of using a point and shoot to capture transient moments.  The macro mode turns out some spectacular images, although it is not always easy to focus on the appropriate object.  I had to give up on several shots after the camera continued to focus on the background instead of the object in the foreground.Bottom line, the Auto mode is inconsistent, but when it "chooses" correctly, the images are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great Go-To Camera for Home and Travel
Reviews.Author: Darby
Reviews.Content: We already have the same camera, which is why we ordered this one.The camera is compact and light, takes great pictures of scenery, people, nature.  Also takes nice videos..We consider it our 'go-to' camera for both home and travel!However, we returned the item today because we found our lost camera that we were trying to replace...

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: GT
Reviews.Content: Bought this last year and it still works remarkably well (There's nothing worse than a review 10 minutes after buying a product - it doesn't mean anything). This camera takes axcellent pictures, is loaded with features and the battey life is excellent. The camera will get hard use for a weekend, then sit for 2 months and still does not need a charge. Way to go, Canon, you got it right.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Biestek
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. This is a great price, it has alot of functions. This camera is a perfect size. You don't mind carrying it around with you.

Reviews.Title: Great point-and-shoot
Reviews.Author: ohsolively "ohsolively"
Reviews.Content: Does the trick. I had the previous model of this camera and it got stolen on St. Patrick's Day. I knew that I wanted the same one so I got the newer model and am very happy with it.Battery life is long, you can add a new card into it so that you get more pictures. The flash doesn't wash people out like most cameras do and there are a bunch of settings to help you take better pictures.Small, compact, sturdy. Perfect for putting in your purse or pocket to capture special moments.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena
Reviews.Author: DOMINGO NARDI
Reviews.Content: Para sesiones de fotos de rutina y videos cortos, esta camara me ha brindado grandes satisfacciones y no tengo quejas de ella, realmente cubrio mis espectativas.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: love the beach
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera several months ago - my decision influenced a great deal by the positive reviews, so thanks to the people who took the time to review it - and am extremely happy with it! The camera is very easy to use, takes incredible pictures, and the lithium battery has a long life between charges. The screen is easy to see in sunlight, and indoors, I can take many pictures without a flash, which gives them a more natural look. I also love the small size. I'm certainly not a professional, but do take a lot of pictures, and I would highly recommend this camera to anyone that wants a simple, compact, full-featured camera!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Great Shot!
Reviews.Author: kathy pede
Reviews.Content: I love my little digital camera. It is so easy to handle and the auto flash and focus really help this personwho has no knowledge of photography.  New grandma needs a good camera...I have one :)

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera.  It fits in your pocket and takes great pictures.  When you hold down the button to take a picture it will take the picture.  I have another camera that takes 2 or 3 seconds to engage and take the picture, it is very annoying.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: lance "Lancer"
Reviews.Content: I have taken thousands of great pics with these cameras. I prefer the metal case. Plenty of clarity to enlarge pics. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: ELPH Canon
Reviews.Author: Timothy Mizelle
Reviews.Content: This is a simple to use camera, takes good pictures/video. Relatively simple to charge the battery right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: second Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Jesse Ferguson
Reviews.Content: After I dropped my first camera PowerShot 300 in the kid's pool, I started shopping for a cheap camera...they don't last (around pool ...) and they keep improving (every few years faster, sharper, etc.), so I shopped around. I ended up buying a PowerShot 300 again! Looking up at the various choices it sounded better than the 110, I think it is. Images are sharp. The video part is also sharper and makes no noise like my previous camera did. It was more expensive in silver color than black. Neither color is waterproof! and black has  a kind of a retro look.I wish cameras had a buzzer system where you can call them when you don't remember where they are, like a phone.

Reviews.Title: Good, but has some bad points
Reviews.Author: BlueSky
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for just over one year and I like it a lot except for two things.  The first problem is that the zoom is somewhat limited in power to what I could have gotten with other cameras.  The other problem is that after one year, the zoom is becoming noisy as it zooms in.  I looked on the Internet and found that other users are also complaining about this.  Zooming in will create a definite clicking sound on recorded videos.  Zooming out is not as bad.  The camera did not originally have this problem.  I don't use the camera a lot, so this problem showed up after very little use even though it's been a year since I purchased the camera.  If you want quiet videos, then don't buy this camera.  I did notice that some users said the problem was only with cameras made in China, and yes, my camera was made in China.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Ljuljzim Berjasevic
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, the 1080p video is just awesome. Very small, lightweight, all the edges are rounded and the sandpapery feel is great. Pictures are OK, not great, the microphone could be better as well. Overall I am very happy with it, money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Nicolette Toussaint
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera; it's my second Canon ELPH. Lightweight and tiny, it's easy to carry when hiking or skiing, and it has a fairly wide frame of vision. That's one of the reasons I choose it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: e
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this camera. The picture quality is amazing. Zooming in does not blur or distort images. I'm a beginner in digital camera's and this works for me. I've always trusted Canon's cameras and this did not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ivan L
Reviews.Content: Very good product i recomend this...y Think is very usefull and easy tu use may be in the future i buy more

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShsot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying the camera.  It's compact to fit in a pocket or purse and takes good pics.  Easy to download to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are very pleased with the quality and versatitlity that comes in this small little camera. I like everything about it, especially the size, it fits in a front pocket with room to spare. Quality is outstanding.Battery life isnt bad and the charger doesnt need a cord,or platform, etc to charge. Less cordage is better for traveling and maintaining the system over time.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot and small enough to carry all the time
Reviews.Author: elaine
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and convenient. I carry mine all the time. The things I shoot that I wouldn't otherwise make it worth having. Images are large and of good quality. I love this little camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH HS 12.1 MP Digital camera
Reviews.Author: MashedPotatoes
Reviews.Content: It has been awhile since I received this camera (almost 8 months). It has exceeded my expectations where versatility is concerned plus good quality photos. This camera has more features than some of thos big clumsy professional looking ones. I have been through all types of cameras starting with the old Box camera to 35 mm, to thrrough the lens cameras and a few digital ones. This one has most of the features anyone would want and more. It is compact and easy to carry and is ready for usein an instant. One amazing feature is making videos in High Definition 1080p

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Patti Fons
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before I bought this since the last point & shoot camera I bought was a Nikon and not only was I disappointed with the picture quality, it stopped working after only a few uses!  Seems Canon makes the best point & shoot. This camera is easy to use and takes great pics without having to adjust settings. So far, so good, and a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: PBell
Reviews.Content: It came really fast and I'm so very happy with my purchase. I've owned lots of Canon cameras and this one doesn't disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Canon vs Nikon
Reviews.Author: identifiedalready
Reviews.Content: Pros:Easy to useSmallNOT touchscreenCons:lanyard didn't have a wrist clasp (where you can size it to your wrist), just the stringI have a Nikon DSLR and I really wanted something easy to just snap photos of the dog doing cute stuff, something I could use in a hurry if I wanted to be able to hand someone else my camera and say, Can you get a photo of us?  having used Nikon point and shoots, I was very disappointed to see how slow the lag time was on them, despite turning all the settings down.I have NO lag issues with the Canon.  The only time I have issues is if the camera isn't focused on anything, then the photo won't take.  But the processing within the camera is quick and it takes less than half a second for your image to display on the screen.  Also, the shutter doesn't take long either (unlike the Nikon where it felt like it had to think about taking the photo).Super happy with this choice!

Reviews.Title: I love everything about this camera
Reviews.Author: Jon H
Reviews.Content: I can't think of a single thing I would change.  Great picture, great colors, amazing feature set and great menus and UI.  I use this all the time and it is a great point and shoot for any situation.  Even does pretty well in low light.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!!
Reviews.Author: gardenlover
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my son to take to Europe when he studied abroad this past semester in college.  We have just looked at the approx 1000 pictures he has taken in 10 countries (he had never had a camera before this)and I am truly amazed at the high quality of these pictures!  The camera fit in his pants pocket, making it very accessible and convenient to taking pictures. It was very rugged and survived taking a beating that traveling can cause. It was easy for him to use and delivered beautiful pictures that he will have for a lifetime to relive his European experiences! We would highly recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot with Ease!
Reviews.Author: Brandt
Reviews.Content: I'm no photographer. In fact, I've gone through many of these point and shoot digital cameras. For those of us who just want to capture a photo a little better than what we've got on our cell phones, this is the camera for you! If you're not looking to customize how the camera takes the photo, this camera is as easy as it gets. Flip the mode to automatic and turn it on a viola! However, when you want to do some more customization (like ensure the flash will be on), it's quite a bit more difficult. Even deleting photos from the camera is a multi-step process. No matter; for quick, easy, automatic point and shoot photos from a compact, pocket camera, this thing is great.

Reviews.Title: Great product with a lot of fun and useful feature but it has delay like most
Reviews.Author: Tony Yu
Reviews.Content: Have been useing it for a couple of years.  It is very small, light weight to carry any where.  it is smaller than most smart phones. It takes excellent pictures.  It has alot of great features.  I am used to my SLR which has no delay when I press the button.  As expected this one does.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: scooter
Reviews.Content: Simple to use with high quality images. Great camera. My only criticism is that the zoom could be smoother. It tends to jump.

Reviews.Title: I'd give it 50 stars if I could, just -- love -- this camera :-)
Reviews.Author: Jeannette Belliveau "Author, Writer, Editor, ...
Reviews.Content: What a lovely camera -- I'm getting magically good people shots. It's as if the camera has a patent on capturing pretty gold light to make my subjects look young and vital. Can't explain it but it seems to somehow work that way. High-def video is quite good too. Only complaint compared to my old Canon PowerShot G2 4MP Digital Camera w/ 3x Optical Zoom is that the battery lasts nowhere as long, so I always carry a charged spare battery -- this is what I have:Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS Digital Camera Battery - Premium TechFuel NB-4L BatteryP.S. Be sure to shop around for the best price -- Try not to pay much more than $120 for this.P.P.S. Unless you have a memory card already, you'll need to buy a memory card as well as a spare battery, it doesn't ship with the memory card -- at least, mine didn't. I use this one with good results: SanDisk Flash 16 GB SDHC Flash Memory Card SDSDB-016G. Once you get your memory card and spare battery together, you will be rolling!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Roger Schramm
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is very durable. It takes great pictures. Easy to use. The rechargable battery really saves money over replaceable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: JORGUEN
Reviews.Content: Can't complain, a great camera, wouldn't change it for a $1000 quality camera, this is more than I need to take a few pictures a week, and with a 32 GB SDHC Card, I can have 9999 pictures or more with the highest quality

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 300 HS 12.1
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Smith "Bluzboy"
Reviews.Content: so far so good. need to get newer os for mac to use software for downloading i like the camera

Reviews.Title: Durable & Perfect .. but you can never have it all right?
Reviews.Author: Armani J. Campbell
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice and durable. I've dropped it, propped it, and have done all kinds of things. I purchased it while I was studying in Costa Rica b/c I had just lost my camera, and the only thing I don't really like is that the panoramic option is manual. In other words, it doesn't really take panoramic photos like it says it does :( ... You have to connect the pictures manually once uploaded.Also... after 6 months of having it, after being on the HOT BEACHES in Costa Rica, being dropped in the concretes of San Jose, & Dallas, sometimes when I zoom, If I am recording video, you are able to hear the camera. And recently it has started to shut off on me...??

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: MD User "MD user"
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera for non-professionals.  The picture quality is sharp, wide angle, good zoom, takes good pics in low light, slim (easy to carry).  The battery is decent, but it comes with a sleek and easy to carry charger.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace my old canon. I have had several point and shoot digicams over the years and this one is the best. Pictures are very good with the 12MP. It has lots of manual adjustment options which I dabble with, but the auto setting works great and is easy to get to. It has a nice metal case as well. It was easy to pick up and start using. I am by no means a professional, but it has given me great pictures and has lasted very well.

Reviews.Title: 4th P&S; Canon camera, extremely happy.
Reviews.Author: VK
Reviews.Content: We have a theory. In P&S;, if it is a cannon, then the likelihood of us not liking it is low. I am not much of a camera guy other than does it take good pictures, is is easy to use and does it last more than a few vacation trips and does it do well in low light. In all of the above, this camera scores high.

Reviews.Title: My Wife Loves It
Reviews.Author: Brent Graham
Reviews.Content: My wife really enjoyed getting this camera for Christmas last year. She took tons of pics while visiting her father, son and granddaughter. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is with our new phones, the camera is not getting much use anymore. Just decide whether your really need a stand-alone camera before investing the money.

Reviews.Title: Fits in your back pocket
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good digital camera that was compact enough to fit in my pocket or a purse pocket.  This camera takes great pictures for what I want....capturing memories and sharing on social media.  The zoom on it is really good, but if you are taking a far away picture with the zoom all the way out, the pic is going to look like such....meaning it will have a bit of haze.  I'm not a camera or photo expert, and I think this is a great camera for anyone else who is looking for a compact camera for everyday pics.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: A. BRYSON
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera, quality photos and perfect for a small purse.  The only thing I don't like about it is the matte finish (at least the black version is matte).  The textured body picks up dirt pretty easy, but I suppose it helps keep you from dropping the camera.

Reviews.Title: very thin and the quality is good
Reviews.Author: Xiangguang Zhang
Reviews.Content: well, i bought it for my sister's christmas, i thinks its cool, the button are good, the quailty is good, i like it, good deal

Reviews.Title: Excellent point-and-shot
Reviews.Author: Jonathon D.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my fiancee's birthday to replace her old Sony camera. She is much happier with this one than her old one. I like it because it uses standard SD cards instead of Sony's proprietary card format. It's smaller than most cameras in its class, which i s definitely a good thing. I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Matthew Pilgrim
Reviews.Content: Just shut up and buy it! I promise you wouldn't be disappointed. It's fast, compact, great photos and video, easy to use and great price for all the features you are getting.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, so far
Reviews.Author: Tim M Weaver
Reviews.Content: I haven't gotten to use it a lot yet, but so far I am very pleased.  Easy to use and takes great shots.

Reviews.Title: A good, handy Camera
Reviews.Author: Murphy
Reviews.Content: The Cannon Powershot is a fine on the go everyday camera. It fits in a pocket or purse for those times you wish you had a camera other than your phone.  12.1 MP and HD video give good saturation of color and detail!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Anathrael
Reviews.Content: The camera works well and functions like it's supposed to.  I needed to get a more advanced camera to get my grand-daughter's action shots more quickly and efficiently.  Too many are blurry.  I believe this is user error, however.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS
Reviews.Author: Fred B. Schroeder "fbsbiz"
Reviews.Content: I have been pleased with this camera. For the kind of photography I do it does what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Memories
Reviews.Author: Maryann Nichols "Seeking"
Reviews.Content: Catching memories of my kids it what I do best. With both still pictures and videos. the features are for me. I love my camera. It's small and able to travel with me. For what the camera intends to do is good enough for me. I am very satisfied. I still need to learn it so most undesirable pictures are from the lack of knowing how to take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad who uses it to take photos of blueprints and machinery (engineer). He uses it almost exclusively inside and he really likes it. I have seen the photos and they are pretty good for a compact.

Reviews.Title: A gift that almost keeped to myself
Reviews.Author: Enrique Sanchez Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Im generally de family member that give the best gifts, so this time I bought this canon for my father. This is a great camara, and actually I tought several times to keep it for myself.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS
Reviews.Author: Judith C. Neumann
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera that takes beautiful pictures.  It is small enough for a pocket or purse, with very little weight and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this cam
Reviews.Author: Corie Buchanan
Reviews.Content: This camera has a tun of features, records in full HD 1080P pictures are super clean.comes with smile and face detection, for a compact camera the features and quality is exceptional.Would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera! Great zoom, great focus, awesome picture results. Easy to use, slim size. Some features do require a read in the manual to figure out, but can then be set for easy access. I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Good camera...Awesome pictures..
Reviews.Author: Vishik
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera a few weeks back and have clicked a couple of hundred pictures so far with it. Also shot a few videos. Very happy with the picture quality, which was my number one priority. I especially liked the low light performance of this camera. The pictures have a really pleasant feel when shooting in low light(not really dark places where flash is a must) without flash. The pre-set modes are fun. The sharp-burst mode is pretty cool as well. The videos have come out very well as well. Overall, I am quite happy. I also own a Canon Powershot SD850IS and the 300 HS, I feel, is most definitely an upgrade over an already excellent 850 IS. We took both the cameras on a trip and you could see the difference - in bright sunlight and stationary, not much of a difference, but in low light and while moving, the 300HS comes on its own. Excellent companion overall!

Reviews.Title: Great little POS!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Tripp
Reviews.Content: The last of the line with no wifi, full HD and a 5X zoom. The size is just right. Photos are sharp.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Karen M Jones
Reviews.Content: I've found this camera to be a great little gadget.  It's pretty user friendly for the electronic illiterate, as I am.

Reviews.Title: Ver y godo camera
Reviews.Author: Tessi Yista
Reviews.Content: Ver y light weight and nice pictures, I think it is a ver y nice option for people who like taking pictures all the time

Reviews.Title: A Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Knmv
Reviews.Content: As a professional photographer, (I personally own a Canon 5D) I bought this for my Mom as an early Christmas Gift. Believe it or not she was still using those 35mm film "one-time-use" cameras (gasp!!) My sister in-law had this camera and enjoyed it for its ease of use and for the quality of photographs it took. I took it for a test run before I plan on giving it to my Mom and I think it does a decent job of exposing the photograph properly and also does a great job of knowing when to use the flash or not. You can also easily turn the flash off, this is also nice. The final thing about this camera is the large view screen. It will make it easier for my Mom to see things as she takes photos of all those grand kids this Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Very Smart Camera
Reviews.Author: lmaustin "crabbylion77"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  It is small but has a multitude of features.  One of the best is the 5 second video it takes before each still picture.  If you miss the shot the video usually gets it.  It takes exceptionally good photos in low light.  I take this camera with me more often because it is so small therefore I take more pictures than I used to.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: SolarChild
Reviews.Content: If I had to compare this to my last camera which was the Canon SD1200is, I would definitely choose the SD1200is, however, this camera takes basically the same quality of photos. Just not too impressed with the outter part of it. It's not as smooth and sleek as the SD1200is. It is heavier and the surface is kinda grainy to the touch (crawls my blood). But very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful performance for a pocket size camera
Reviews.Author: FBL
Reviews.Content: I love to take pics and I would love to have a really nice, big camera, but right now we can affort it, so we have this one and I love it.  I have kids and I can take pics of them running, playing and jumping and the pics I take are very nice.

Reviews.Title: Let's face it, it's a point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Johnny Spangle "-0-"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality, features, portability ... so many point and shoots are so close to each other in these departments that really it's down to arbitrary personal preference. Never had a problem with a Canon so why change. Price is decent.

Reviews.Title: canon camera
Reviews.Author: ljf "ljf"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to work. It will focus fast and the pictures are great.Light weight. The charger is compact and no cords.

Reviews.Title: Works awesomely, very clear pictures.
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I guess I would have to complain about, would be that I personally don't like the fact that it has a battery pack. I would rather buy new AA batteries than a battery pack. I was under the impression that it used store bought AA or AAA batteries. Also, I was under the impression that the camera would FEEL like a regular smooth camera, but it feels like it has been spray painted. A different kind of texture than I am used to. A little shocking at first, but I'm getting used to it.It takes wonderful pictures and I'm sure once I get used to the settings and figure out how to use it properly, I will love it even more. Very impressed with how clear the pictures are. The zoom is also fantastic.Would DEFINATELY recommend this camera. For the price, it does well better than I thought. Very high class pictures for not as much as the usual pro cameras cost.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera...
Reviews.Author: M.N. "maddie"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes pretty good pics, but for the fourth of july my fireworks pictures turned out terrible. It states that it has a fireworks scene but it doesn't cause i can't find it anywhere on the camera. That's my only complaint. Otherwise not bad at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James B.
Reviews.Content: I got this for my Girlfriends birthday to replace an older worn out camera, the options on it are great and we have yet to back a picture that looked terrible with it. The setting range from I just want to push on button to I want to play with some settings. The video function works great and sound pick up is alot better than I had expected..

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 300
Reviews.Author: Reg
Reviews.Content: This Canon Powershot although not the latest in the Powershot line, proved to be a consistently good, automatic focus, camera. It was easy to use, smaller than my cellphone, and quickly adjusted between outdoor motion shots or  low light indoor shooting.

Reviews.Title: GREAT buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Ziegler
Reviews.Content: Lots of options, great picture quality, great video quality, light weight, somewhat sturdy.  You get a lot of camera for the money.  Only downside is it really can go through the battery quick but I have it doing all sorts of trick shots.

Reviews.Title: Canon SD300
Reviews.Author: Jim Cosgrove
Reviews.Content: My new Canon 300 is everything I expected and more!The pictures are clear and concise and operation is easy, perfect for me!I wish I could have got it in red for the same price!This Camera is outstandng!Thank You,Jim Cosgrove

Reviews.Title: Perfect shared camera
Reviews.Author: TMQ
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to be shared by 15 people at our office.  It has taken great photos and is intuitive enough such that people with little or no experience can turn it on and take great pictures.  So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: A good buy
Reviews.Author: Graham Rob
Reviews.Content: This was bought as a present, and the recipient is very pleased with the camera.  The video quality is quite superior as is the low light capability.  In general, very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best point and shoot out there
Reviews.Author: Todd Miller
Reviews.Content: Canon is the best! Nothing else in this price range compares. I only wish I would have bought the one that came with the accessory kit. I have already spent more than $40 on accessories and didn't get half what is in the Camera plus kit deal.

Reviews.Title: A very nice point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: LorioL
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to give my husband for Father's Day.  He was going on a driving trip and I thought he would enjoy having his own camera.  Usually we use my Canon.It was easy for him to learn to use.  He took many pictures on his trip.This was a good investment!

Reviews.Title: Failed after a few months
Reviews.Author: D. Lee
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures, and the video button on the back is a nice touch. Otherwise, it's pretty much like any other point-and-shoot. But after 7 months, the LCD display on the back just died completely, making the camera useless. I found a number of complaints on other sites about the LCD display dying like that. I've shipped it back to their repair department (the warranty process was quite easy) so we'll see if they get it repaired quickly and if the camera is reliable after that.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: spittykitty
Reviews.Content: Bought as an easy to carry point and shoot camera, but I was surprised at all the higher end features it has.  Does great in the auto setting at taking candid photos in low light.  Does well in bright sunny settings also.  Good all around camera - it was highly rated by CNET and I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good camera small footprint
Reviews.Author: Tankery "Tankery"
Reviews.Content: I have the grandpappy of point and shoot Canons-the G12 and that is a top notch camera in that category but of all the ones that actually fit in your jeans pocket, this is the best of those that I have used.  I have the silver one and I had a black one but I dropped it with the cheap plastic lens open and it broke of course.  None of these types of point and shoots are particularly durable.  I didn't plan on replacing the black one and I bought a 310 hs instead.  The 310 just didn't take as sharp a picture as the 300, it seemed like.  So I sold the 310 and got this silver one for just over a hundred dollars.  A couple of years have gone by and several cameras attained in the family and still this 300 ends up in my pocket whenever, on vacation, etc.  The video is surprisingly good compared not only to a Nikon P7100 we have but also even better than my wife's LX5.So, I would advise getting one of these before they are gone.  The silver one is sharper looking than the black one.  The brown lettering is cool, people say.  Anyway.This is a far superior camera to an Nikon S01 that I have briefly and is barely bigger.  No, the s100 and s110 are better, no doubt, but you can't get them for a hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: Great transaction!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Jean Klein
Reviews.Content: This item shipped super fast and arrived in brand new condition as described.  The camera was a replacement for one that I lost.  It's a wonderful camera for the price.  Overall, Great transaction!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Diana
