Reviews.Content: Features wise - this is a very nice camera but when you touch the camera - its not that good. Actually the problem comes up when you try to use it. Though people say that rough texture is good as camera will not slip out of your hand but the feel of touching this camera is not good. So I didn't like it. I returned this camera and purchased a new one Canon ELPH 310 HS. Everything else is same in 310 as well. Outer texture is also good there. Also - 310 HS has 8X optical zoom. so overall - i liked 310 HS rather than 300 HS.

Reviews.Title: Great But..
Reviews.Author: Curtis B. Whatley
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot. It is not a super deluxe DSLR but no one said it was. It takes very god point and shoot photos and has enough features you can be very creative if you care to. The only caution is....it does not ship with an SD card so don't expect to use it right out of the box unless you order some memory.

Reviews.Title: Washed out pics - both auto & ISO200-400, Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Chuck Aspen
Reviews.Content: Replaced my Sony DSC-W350 with this camera 1 month ago. All pictures taken are washed out. Tried multiple combinations with same results:1.Indoors vs Outdoors2.Auto vs specific ISOs3.Day vs NightGood things to be said are:1.Solid sturdy feel with its all metal construct2.Very fast startupBut this camera fails Canon's reputation and the pic quality is a deal breaker, so please avoid this camera, DO NOT do yourself a disservice by getting this camera.Going back to my DSC-W350(for now)and giving away this camera to a friend's young kid to play around with.

Reviews.Title: Didn't like rough texture of body, unlike past Canon's
Reviews.Author: rgreen "rgreen"
Reviews.Content: I have owned the Canon cameras for a while, upgrading every 2 yrs.  This one I returned.  I'm sure it's a nice camera, but the new anti-slip feel on the outside body of the camera feels like sandpaper - so not a nice experience holding the camera.  They probably did it to make it non-slip, but end result is a nasty sandpaper feel.

Reviews.Title: Camera doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Arnold G. Tijerina III
Reviews.Content: The camera I received was defective. When I turn it on, the screen comes on but it takes a full minute for any of the buttons to work and be ready to take a picture. This is the second Canon Ive purchased in the last 6 weeks that had this issue (the first I bought was a S95). All of my online searches indicate this is a precursor to the dreaded "Lens Error". Based on all the great reviews, I thought this one would be different. I was wrong.

Reviews.Title: Am Lovin it!!!
Reviews.Author: Lioness
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera and boi am I in lurveee!!!lol Its beyond my expectations, truly amazing cam. More than worth the price, so dont hesitate, snatch it up!!

Reviews.Title: Canon did a bad job on this one
Reviews.Author: Samuel Seidel
Reviews.Content: I had two powershots and wanted to get a new one, so I tried this one.  There was sooo much noise if you zoomed into the image at all it was unacceptable.  Canon is going the wrong way making a camera like this.  I want the image quality to be good before adding other features.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE Made in China Version !! Get Made in Japan
Reviews.Author: Steven Lesmana "King of Hearts"
Reviews.Content: Got the camera today but unfortunately I got MADE IN CHINA instead of MADE IN JAPAN ! There are different !Made in China, when you recording video and zooming, you will hear Zoom motor sound !Made in Japan, there is no noise or sound when you recording video and zooming. And of course Made in Japan last longer than Made in China.Other than that, the Camera produce good quality of picture. Better than my Canon SD 780 especially in low light.I'm returning mine and looking for "Made in Japan"

Reviews.Title: Can't stand Sandpapery Texture
Reviews.Author: Jenny Sandler
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and I think I probably would have LOVED this camera except the texture of it is like sandpaper and it really bothers me. So much that its uncomfortable to hold. I think there are a lot of people who wouldn't be bothered by this, but for me its so unpleasant that I am returning it and buying the silver one instead, which I understand has a more normal texture/finish. I had the Canon S95 in the past and it had a faintly rough texture which I really liked, and this camera is totally different. If you are used to the texture of the S95 this one is not the same.Aside from the texture, the camera is great. I expect that I will like it just as much as the Canon S95 that I used previously. It does feel a bit small in your hand. I'm sure that after a short period of time, I would get used to that and appreciate the convenience of the small size.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't buy this from AMAZON again
Reviews.Author: Jefftahoe
Reviews.Content: My complaint is with AMAZON not CANON! They did not ship the HDMI cable or the 4 GB card as advertised the day I made my purchase and to top it off there is NO packing slip and no way to contact them. My family spent a bit of money with AMAZON this season. Won't next year!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 300 HS
Reviews.Author: Clifford Martin
Reviews.Content: I expected a lot better from a camera in the Canon Elph series than the 300 HS produced. The camera I received doesn't want to focus on the objects that I want it to focus on. I have tried both automatic and manual modes, and it still won't produce a consistant in focus photo. The couple of photos that I did manage to get in focus, were much to grainy. The camera is a severe disappointment for me, and is being return for a refund.The body of the camera has a rough feel texture. Another problem with this camera is that no where on the body is it designed for you to effectively hold the camera. The flash placement is such that it can easily be blocked or adversely effected by how the user holds the camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Nanticoke's Child
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with Full 1080p HD Video (Red) I ordered this item, because it stated it came with a free 4g memory card and a carrying case. Only the camera arrived, Without the memory card and case, so Now, I have to make an additional purchase to buy a memory card, which I Had Not expected to do. Thanks to this experience, I will never purchase an expensive digital / electronic device again!

Reviews.Title: fake
Reviews.Author: PayLe$$
Reviews.Content: Even though other sellers had it for cheaper than what Amazon.com LLC sold it for at the time, I bought this camera from amazon.com (seller: Amazon.com LLC) just to be safe. This camera felt very funny when I first touched it. I'm a long time canon user. Still didn't want to think that I got ripped off by Amazon.com LLC. But just to clear out my head I went some other stores checked it out. And found out that PowerShot ELPH 300 HS, made is Japan, while one that Amazon sent me was made in china. I'm going to contact canon and return this useless .......

Reviews.Title: Good but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Joyce Z
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Clear image2. High resolution3. Slim and simple design4. Large LCD5. Battery cover is flimsyCons:1. Distorted/elongated the left & right edges of the photo (are all digital cameras like this nowadays? cuz my old Sony digital camera don't have this problem).2. Inaccurate battery warning, no percentage, but only 3 bars (the battery was fully charged and was used very little for 2-3 days. I left it in the camera, a few more days later, it still showed "full" at 11am, then it died at around 3-4pm. I only less than 20 photos!)3. Battery dies fast!4. No day time in the display5. Auto mode behaves inconsistently. (The flash sometimes will only work in Auto-mode, I have to use the Manual mode to make sure it works.)6. Make photos vivid one at a time in the camera only. (I wonder why there's no option to take photos vividly or comes with a software to make all photos vivid in the computer.)7. Sometimes pressing the big buttons to take pictures don't work. (When I try to take self-shots, I pressed the big button and saw the lens blink, but photo is not captured.)8. The "review" function is slow when it's off after every photo is taken. (When I tried to make quick shots at an event, I turned off the review function, but it still makes me wait 1 second to take a second photo.)I've never own anything better than this camera. I start to see its cons as I use it, but I still love this camera.Everyone was talking about getting the camera that's made in Japan. Mine's made in Japan. Hope it lasts long.Update 2/21/2012:Ricardo is right. I found that vivid photo setting.And the distorted edges are call "barrel distortion." The lens is built this way and there is no way to disable it. The distortion is fine when taking landscape pictures, but it really widen & fatten people on the sides when trying to take group pictures or when trying to take self-shots. :(Photos were not deleted from the flash memory card when I tried to do it in my computer. I've to either delete them or format the card from the camera if I need more space.

Reviews.Title: overrated and overpriced
Reviews.Author: Hilton N. Dominguez "surfguard"
Reviews.Content: i bought it last week since it had mostly great reviews. right after i bought it for close to 200 dollars i noticed that amazon lowered the price to 140 bucks. i called but they werent much help. when u check out the reviews u really get ur hopes up u really think that ur gonna get excellent pics.  first of all the camera doesn't work unless u buy the sd card. second i took a few shots at home with the flash on shot a video and reviewed it online to see how well was my much anticipated resolution.  i quickly learned that the resolution is ok but nothing that wowed me. i zoomed the pics to see how well it retained its resolution but i noticed it became pixelated.  then i played the video to see how well it looked...i gotta say it looked ok not great...i think that this camera probably throws some excellent pics on places with lots of light or sunny environments....the pics look ok with some in the good range, but i wouldn't vote it a 5 or 4 stars like many people do so here.  i think its a great camera and would say excellent if it costs under 140 bucks....well these r my initial complaints...hope it helps...if u r new into digital cams and r looking for a decent camera i would recomm it but don't pay more than 140 bucks....if u have owned digital cameras and ur searching for something nice and with really amazing high resolution pics then i would research other cameras cuz i don't think u would be wow by this camera....good luck and god bless

Reviews.Title: Amazon Overprice
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Hite
Reviews.Content: The Cannon Camera is excellent.BUT THE PRICE WAS $20.00 HIGHER THAN AN ADVERTISENT IN LAST WEEKS BOSTON GLOBEFROM HUNT CAMERA. ?????????Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

Reviews.Title: Worst camera I ever bought
Reviews.Author: Vijay
Reviews.Content: This is one of the worst camera I ever bought. Couple of years back I bought powershot S3IS which is still far better than this camera.Stills at night and video on normal light condition are better than my old camera. But in normal light condition pictures looks lifeless, I wont recommend this if you used an average quality camera before.

Reviews.Title: Video incompatible with Windows
Reviews.Author: jsc
Reviews.Content: The problem with this, and other Canon cameras that use this video format (.mov), is that it is only compatible with the Mac, not PC/Windows.  No amount of updating QuickTime, codecs, or other software, would allow the video to play smoothly, and be edited with a PC/Windows machine.While the photos were excellent, the video was useless.  Returned for refund.

Reviews.Title: AN UTTERLY USELESS JOKE !
Reviews.Author: James Beavers "Gwugluud Barcher"
Reviews.Content: Splurged on this Canon 300 HS because I wasn't satisfied with the audio quality of my Vivitar X014.  So I shoot a test vid using this Canon.  When I play it back thru my puter the vid glitches and goes further and further out of sync with the audio. Okay, must be something simple.  I consult the manual.  ... *blink*  ...  It says to expect frames to drop, to expect your vid to not play smoothly, and not to be alarmed if your audio stops suddenly.Someone will reply, "But your compyoooo, turr may not have thuh caip, puh-BILL, itt-tees tuh play videos.  Cancha REEEEED?My $40 Vivitar walmart special's vids played great.  Perfect sync every time.  Never an issue.  And my puter's a brand new Toshiba.  I... DO BELIEVE I'll be making a return trip to Staple's in the morning, this camera and all its accoutrements tucked neatly back into the box which I will have in hand as I walk in their door...

Reviews.Title: memory card
Reviews.Author: johnbe
Reviews.Content: For those buying this camera, you need to know that a memory card is not included with it, therefore you will not be able to use this camera out of the box, even with the battery charged. Also, the Canon webite does not sell a memory camera specific for this camera. Don't be disappointed at Christmas, remember that the memory card must be purchased separately. The camera will not work without it.

Reviews.Title: What a Crock!
Reviews.Author: Roger Fox
Reviews.Content: I've never bought a camera in my lifetime (62 years) where I couldn't take a picture taking the camera right out of the box.  NOT this one!  I have to wait 'til I get the memory card!!!!!!!!!!!  Can't tell anybody about picture quality 'cause there's no memory card!  This camera may very well be the greatest thing since sliced bread but w/no memory card it's just a paperweight.And the two 32GB memory cards are "Shipping Soon" along with the matching case.What a crock!

Reviews.Title: Too Small in Size
Reviews.Author: Cat Lady "Cat Lady"
Reviews.Content: I returned the camera to Amazon because it was too small in size. I didn't realize they make such tiny cameras. I should have done more research before ordering it. The price was good but too small for me to handle.

World's thinnest digital camera with a 24mm ultra Wide-Angle lens and 5x Optical Zoom and Optical Image Stabilizer.

Full 1080p HD Video for exceptional quality with stereo sound, plus a dedicated movie button for easy access.
